English: We’ve heard that there have been some problems with sewage in this neighborhood.
Transliteration: sme’na bilee kaayin shee mashaakil fal- qawaadis fi-haad l-Hooma
Arabic: سمعنا باللي كاين شي مشاكل فالقوادس فهاد لحومة

English: Do you have any problems with your plumbing?
How many toilets do you have in the house?
Transliteration: sh-Haal min buyoot iR-RaaHa ‘andek fid- daaR?
Arabic: شحال من بيوت الراحة عندك في الدار؟

English: Do you have a septic tank?
Is there anyone who can fix your sewer?
Have you contacted anyone regarding this problem? If so who?
Transliteration: ‘ayTeyToo lekaash waaHid baash yaHil haad il-mushkil? shkoon haad is-seeyid?
Arabic: عيطتو لكاش واحد باش يحل هاد المشكل؟ شكون هاد السيد؟

English: I will report this higher up and see if there is something we can do to fix the sewage problem.
Transliteration: Raanee RaayiH nuwaSil haad il-ma’loomaat lil- mas-ooleen wenshoof wila naqedRoo nsigamoo il-qawaadis
Arabic: راني رايح نوصل هاد المعلومات للمسؤولين ونشوف ولا نقدرو نسقمو القوادس

English: We will contact the sewage company and find out what is being done to correct the problem.
Transliteration: Raanaa RaayHeen n’ayaToo lish-sheReeka taa’ leyplombyey baash na’aRafoo waash naqedRoo ndeeRoo baash nHaloo haad il- mushkil
Arabic: رانا رايحين أنعيطو للشركة تاع ليبلوبيي باش نعرفو واش نقدرو انديرو باش انحلو هد المشكل

English: How many radios and TVs are in this area?
Transliteration: sh-Haal min Raadyoo oo-teleyvizyon kaayin fi-haad laazon?
Arabic: شحال من راديو وتلفزيون كاين فهاد لازون؟

English: Do you have a radio station in this area?
Do you have a TV station in the area?
Do you have a public announcement system?
Is there a news agency representative nearby?
Transliteration: kaayin waaHid ilee yimitil wakaalat aKhbaaR qaReeba min ihnaa?
Arabic: كاين واحد اللي يمتل وكالة اخبار قريبة من هنا؟

English: Where do you buy a newspaper?
What was produced on the farm?

Transliteration: shkoon ilee Raahoo saakin fee il-fyeRma?
Arabic: شكون الي راهو ساكن في الفيرما؟

English: I will contact the appropriate authorities to investigate this matter.
Transliteration: Raanaa RaayHeen nitaSloo bis-suluTaat il-munaasiba baash nibaHtoo fi-haad il- mushkil
Arabic: رانا رايحين نتصلو بالسلطات المناسبة باش نبحتو فهاد المشكل

English: Please know we will assist you.
You must allow the local authorities to conduct their investigation.
Transliteration: laazim tiKhalee is- suluTaat il-maHaleeya deeR lonkaat
Arabic: لازم تخلي السلطات المحلية دير لونكات

English: You must go to the base and speak with an interpreter.
Transliteration: laazim tRooH labaaz oo-tih-deR ma’ mutaRjim
Arabic: لازم تروح لباز و تهدر مع مترجم

English: What is the condition of the property?
Transliteration: washnoo heeya il- Haala taa’ il-mulk?

English: Put your hands on the steering wheel and do not move them.

Transliteration: maa Raaksh taHtaRim il-qawaaneen taa’ HaDR it-tajawul
Arabic: ما راكش تحترم القوانين تاع حضر التجول

Transliteration: HaDR it-tajawul Raahoo saaRee il- maf’ool

English: Did you know there is a curfew?
Arabic: كنت عارف الي كاين حضر التجول؟

English: The streets are not safe right now.
We will escort you to your relatives.
The police station will give you information about curfew.
Transliteration: laapolees RaayiHa ta’Teelek ma’loomaat ‘ala HaDR it-tajawul
Arabic: لابوليس رايحة تعطيلك معلومات على حضر التجول

English: May I see your ID, please?
Transliteration: naqdeR nshoof beeTaaqit it-ta’Reef taa’ek SaHa?
Arabic: نقدر نشوف بطاقة التعريف تاعك صح؟

English: How much money are you carrying?
Do you have a gun under the seat?
Since you broke the law, we have to arrest you.
Arabic: كي ما حترمتش القانون لازم نحبسوك

English: We have to take you to the police station.
You will ride with us to the police station.
Transliteration: Raak RaayiH itjee ma’aanaa li-maRkaz ish-shuRTa
Arabic: راك رايح تجي معانا لمركز الشرطة

English: Can you help verify the man’s identity?
Transliteration: taqdeR t’aawin-nee baash inveeReefee haweeyet haad iR- Raajil?
Arabic: تقدر تعاوني باش انفيريفي هوية هد الراجل؟

English: Who does this ammunition belong to?
We are going to detain you and confiscate your truck.
Transliteration: Raanaa RaayHeen naHakmook oo- neHeeyulek il-kaamyoo dyaalek
Arabic: رانا رايحين نحكموك و نحيولك الكاميو ديالك

English: You will get your truck back if you tell us who you are taking this to.
Transliteration: Raanaa RaayHeen niKhaleeyulek il- kaamyoo dyaalek eedha qultin-naa limen kunt RaayiH tuwiSal haad ish-shee
Arabic: رانا رايحين نخليولك الكاميو ديالك إذا قلتنا لمن كنت رايح توصل هد الشي

English: Get out of the truck please.
We need to inspect the cargo.
Where did you get this ammunition?
Who is responsible for food distribution?
Is this village used for secondary distribution?
Which villages receive assistance from this village?
Transliteration: washnoo hoomaa il-beelaajaat ilee yaaKhdoo il- mu’aawana min haad il-beelaaj?
Arabic: وشنوهوما البيلاجات الي ياخدو المعاونة من هد البيلاج؟

English: How many damaged houses in this village?
Transliteration: sh-Haal min daaR mdamRa fi-haad il- beelaaj?
Arabic: شحال من دار مدمرة فهاد البيلاج؟

English: How many unfinished houses in this village?
Transliteration: sh-Haal min daaR maashee kaamla fi- haad il-beelaaj?
Arabic: شحال من دار ماشي كاملة فهاد البيلاج؟

English: Was there any new war damage to buildings since before the conflict?
Transliteration: kaan kaayin damaaR jdeed fil-beenaayaat qbil maa tibda il- geeRa?
Arabic: كان كاين دمار جديد فالبنايات قبل ما تبدا القيرا؟

English: Is there a school in the village?
Is there a mosque in the village?
Is there any source of food available in the village?
Transliteration: kaayin maSdaR lil- maakla fee il-beelaaj?

English: Is there a road access for cars?
Is there a road access for four- wheel drive?
Transliteration: laayin TaReeq ween yumkin nsoogoo kaaTkaaT?
Arabic: كاين طريق وين يمكن نسوقو كاطكاط؟

English: Is there a road access for trucks?
Is the road accessible in the winter?
Transliteration: naqedRoo nsoogoo fi-haad iT-TaReeq fish- shtaa?

English: What is the number of the current population?
Let me put you in contact with someone who can help you.
Transliteration: Khaleenee nHuTek ‘ala iteeSaal ma’ waaHid yaqdeR yi’aawnek
Arabic: خليني انحطك على اتصال مع واحد يقدر يعاونك

English: Where is your car right now?
Can you bring your car here?
What Civilian Forces’ vehicle damaged your car?
Transliteration: washmen Tonobeel taa’ il-qoowaat il- madaneeya ilee DaRabit Tonobeeltek?
Arabic: وشمن طونوبيل تاع القوات المدنية اللي ضربت طونوبيلتك؟

English: What soldiers were involved in the accident?
Transliteration: shkoon il-junood ilee ‘and-hum ‘alaaqa bi- haad laakseedaan?
Arabic: شكون الجنود الي عندهم علاقة بهاد لاكسيدان؟

English: In order to be compensated for damages, you must fill out this document.
Transliteration: baash taaKhud ta’weeDaat ‘ala il- aDRaaR laazim t’amaR haad il-wRaq
Arabic: باش تاخد تعويضات على الأضرار لازم تعمر هد الورق

English: I will take you to him.
In order to be compensated for damages, you must see ___.
Transliteration: baash taaKhud ta’weeDaat ‘ala il- aDRaaR laazim titkilim ma’ ___
Arabic: باش تاخد تعويضات على الأضرار لازم تتكلم مع ___

English: In order to be compensated for damages, you must talk to ___.
Transliteration: baash taaKhud ta’weeDaat ‘ala il- aDRaaR laazim t’amaR haad il-wRaq ___
Arabic: باش تاخد تعويضات على الأضرار لازم تعمر هد الورق ___

English: Where do you live? / What is your address?
Transliteration: ween tuskun? / washnoo heeya laadReysaa taa’ek?
Arabic: وين تسكن / وشنو هي لادريسا تاعك؟

English: What kind of car is it? (year, make, model)
Transliteration: washnoo hoowa in-no’ taa’ iT-Tonobeel? (il- ’aam win-no’ wil-model)
Arabic: وشنوهو النوع تاع الطونوبيل؟ (العام والنوع و الموديل)

English: We need to inspect the dairy plant.
Transliteration: laazim inkonTRoleeyu il- ma’mel taa’ il-Haleeb

English: We need to inspect the poultry plant.
Transliteration: laazim inkonTRoleeyu il- ma’mel taa’ id-dajaaj

English: When was the last time these animals were inoculated?
Transliteration: wuqtaash aaKheR maRa tlaqHat haad il- Hayawaanaat?

English: Do they need to be vaccinated?
This food is spoiled, please do not eat it.
Transliteration: haad il-maakla KhaasiRa, maa-taakloohaash alaah yiKhaleekum
Arabic: هاد الماكلة خاسرة، ماتاكلوهاش الله يخليكم

English: Are the crops infected with insects?
Are the animals infected with parasites?
Where can we purchase vegetables and fruit?
Transliteration: ween naqedRoo nishRoo il- KhuDRa wil-faakeeya?

English: Where can we purchase bread and grains?
Transliteration: ween naqedRoo nishRoo il- Khubz wil-Huboob?

English: Where can we purchase dairy products?
Arabic: وين نقدرو نشرو الحليب والمشتقات ديالو؟

English: We need to examine the herd.
We need to examine the animals on the farm.
Transliteration: inkonTRoleeyu il- Hayawaanaat ilee kaayna fil-fyeRma
Arabic: لازم نكونطروليو الحيوانات اللي كاينة فالفيرما

English: We need to inspect the slaughterhouse for sanitation.
We need to inspect the bakery for sanitation.
We are here to help you.
I do not understand your language.
There is no one available who speaks this language.
Transliteration: maakaayin Hata waaHed hnaa yitkilem haad al-loogha
Arabic: ما كايِنْ حَتَى واحَد هْنا يَتْكَلَم هَدْ اللُغَة.

English: Try to answer my questions with “yes” or “no.”
Move your head like this for “yes.”
Transliteration: HaRak Raasek haakDa eela Habeet tqool “eeh”
Arabic: حرك راسك هاكذ إلا حبيت تقول “إيه .”

English: Move your head like this for “no.”
Transliteration: HaRak Raasek haakDa eela Habeet tqool “laala”
Arabic: حرك راسك هاكذ إلا حبيت تقول “لالا.”

English: Do you know where you are?
We will try to contact someone from your group.
Transliteration: Hnaa RaayHeen nkoon Taakteew bwaaHed mil- majmoo’a nta’aak
Arabic: حْنا رانا رايْحين نْكونْطاكْتيوْ بواحَد مْنْ المَجْموعَة نْتاعَك.

English: Thank you for talking with me.
I will talk with you again.
Hold up the number of fingers.

Arabic: عَبَزْ عَلَى يَدي مَرَة واحْدَة كتْحَبْ تْقول ”إيه.“
عَبَزْ عَلَى يَدي زوجْ مَرات كتْحَبْ تْقول ”لاَلاَ.“

English: I need to clean your wounds.
I am here to help you.
What country were you born in?
Do you have an identity card?
Do you have any bad reactions to medications?
Transliteration: kaayin dwaa lookaan taKhdoo maa- taHamloosh?
Arabic: كايِن دْوا لُوكانْ تاخْدو ما تَحَمْلُوشْ؟

English: What is the name of the medication that causes bad reactions?
Transliteration: washnoo hoowa ism ad-dwaa alee maa- taHamloosh?
Arabic: واشْنو هُوَ اسْم الدْوا اللي ما تَحَمْلُوشْ؟

English: Do you have any allergies to medicines?
How many packs of cigarettes do you smoke per day?
Arabic: تَكْمي شْحَالْ مَنْ بَاكي في اليوم؟

English: Do you have high blood pressure problems?
Do you have blood sugar control problems?
Transliteration: ‘andek mooshkeela fil- kontRol a’la as-sookaR fid-dam?
Arabic: عندك مشكلة في الكُونْتْرُولْ على السكر في الدم؟

English: We will take care of you.
We will try not to hurt you further.
Transliteration: Raanaa RaayHeen nseeyoo maa- nawaj’ooksh akthaR
Arabic: رانا رايْحينْ نْسِيُو ما نُوَجْعُوكْشْ أكثر.

Transliteration: Raak Haas bewja’ fee kaash blaasa?
Arabic: راك حاسْ بُوْجَعْ في كاشْ بلاصا؟

English: Show me where it hurts worst.
When did you have your last meal?
We need to take you to surgery.
If we do not operate, you may lose this.
Transliteration: taqdeR tifqad haada lookaan maa- noopeyReyoosh

English: The operation is dangerous, but it is the only way to help you.
Transliteration: haad al’-amaleeya waa’Ra, laakin maakaash TaReeqa ooKhRa n’aaljek beeha
Arabic: هَدْ العَمَلية واعْرَة ، لكن ماكاش طريقة أُخرى نْعالجك بيها.

English: Do you understand that you need this surgery?

Transliteration: Raanaa RaayHeen ndeeRoo al-’amaleeya oo nit-halaaw feeha
Arabic: رانا رايحين نْديرُو العَمَلية وُنَتْهَلاَو فيها.

English: We want your permission before we operate on you.
Transliteration: Raanaa miHtaajeen laakoR taa’ek baash ndeeRoolek al- ’amaleeya
Arabic: رَانا محتاجين لاَكُورْ تاعَكْ بَاشْ نْديرولَك العملية.

English: We will begin the operation as soon as we can.
Transliteration: Raanaa RaayHeen ndeeRoo al-’amaleeya fee aqRab waqt
Arabic: رانا رايحين نْديرُو العَمَلية في اقرب وقت.

English: This medicine will make you sleep.
Do you have any allergies, especially to medications?
Arabic: عندك أي حساسية خاصة لكاش أدوا؟

English: Do you have high blood pressure / diabetes or blood sugar control problems?
Transliteration: ‘andek mashaakel fee DaghT ad-dam wila fis- sookar wila fee nisbet as-sookaR fee ad-dam?
Arabic: عندك مشاكل في ضغظ الدم وَلَ في السكر وَلَ في نسبة السكر في الدم؟

English: We are all working to help you.
Help us take care of you.
We have to remove your clothes.
Do you have any bad reactions to any medicine?
Have you eaten food in the past six hours?
Transliteration: kleet kaash Haaja fis-sit saa’aat alee faatit?
Arabic: كْليت كاش حاجة في الست ساعات اللي فاتت؟

English: Is this injury from a landmine?
Is this from a vehicle crash?
Transliteration: haadee DaRba taa’ aakseedaan ntaa’ Tonobeel?
Arabic: هَدي ضَرْبَة تاعْ آكسيدان نتاع طنوبيل؟

English: Did a person do this to you?
Transliteration: kaash waaHed daaR feek haad ash-shee?
Arabic: كاشْ واحد دَارْ فيك هَدْ الشِي؟

English: Did you lose consciousness after this happened?
Did you lose more than this much blood?
Point to all the parts of your body that hurt.
Transliteration: waReelee kool waash yoowij’ak fee jismek
Arabic: وُري كُلْ وَاش يُوَجْعَك في جِسْمَك

English: Does it hurt when I do this?
Did you inhale any smoke or very hot air?
Transliteration: shameet doKhaan wila hwaa sKhoon bezaaf?
Arabic: شميت دخان ولا هْوَا سْخُون بَزَافْ؟

Transliteration: haada Raahoo RaayiH ee’aawin baash eeHabes lenfeksyon
Arabic: هَدَا رَاهو رَايَح يْعَاوُن بَاشْ يْحَبَسْ التَلَوُثْ / لنفكسيون.

English: I have to put a small needle in you here.
We need to give you fluid.
We need to give you blood.
I need to put a tube into your throat.
This tube will help you breathe better.
Transliteration: Haad at-tweeyoo Raahoo RaayiH ee’aawnek titnafas kheeR
Arabic: هَدْ التْوييُو رَاهُو رايَحْ يْعَاوْنَك تَتْنَفَسْ خِيرْ.

English: I need to put a tube through your nose to your stomach.
Transliteration: aana laazem ndaKhal at-tweeyoo min neefek lil-me’da ntaa’ek
Arabic: أنا لازَمْ أَنْدَخَلْ التْوييُو من نِيفَك للمَعْدَة تاعَك.

English: You need to swallow while I put this tube in your nose.
Transliteration: laazem tibla’ kee- ndaKhal haad at- tweeyoo fee neefek
Arabic: لازَمْ تَبْلَعْ كِي نْدَخَلْ هَدَ التْوييُو في نِيفَكْ.

English: Drink this while I gently place the tube into your nose.
Transliteration: ashRab haada kee ndaKhal at-tweeyoo bla’qel fee neefek
Arabic: إشرَبْ هَدَا كِي نْدَخَلْ التْوييُو بْلَعْقَلْ في نِيفَكْ.

English: This tube will drain your stomach.
Transliteration: Haada at-tweeyoo Raahoo RaayiH eefaRigh al-me’da ntaa’ek
Arabic: هَدْ التْوييُو رَاهُو رَايَحْ يْفَرَغْ المَعَدة نتاعك.

English: I have to put a small tube into your neck to give you fluid.
Transliteration: laazem ndaKhal at- tweeyoo SgheeR fee Raqabtek baash na’Teek dee flooweed
Arabic: لازَمْ نْدَخَلْ التْوييُو صغير في رقبتك با ش نعطيك دي فلويد.

English: I need to put a tube in your chest.
Transliteration: laazem ndaKhal at- tweeyoo fee SadRek

English: This needle will release the air from your chest.
Transliteration: haad al-ebRa Tela’lek la-hwaa min SadRek
Arabic: هَدَ الإبرة طْلَعْلَكْ الهْوَا من صدرك.

English: I need to cut your skin.
We have to restrain you for your safety.
You have been burned by a chemical.
We need to wash the chemicals from your skin.
Transliteration: laazem nghasil al- jilda ntaa’ek min lee pRodwee sheemeek
Arabic: لازَمْ نْغَسَلْ الجَلدة تاعَكْ من لي بْرودْوي شيميكْ.

English: You will need to be completely washed.
Hold this dressing and apply pressure.
I need to splint your arm.
I need to splint your leg.
I am applying a tourniquet to stop the bleeding.
Transliteration: aana nHuT haad al- Haaja baash nHabis ad-dam
Arabic: أنى نحط هاد الحاجة باش تحبس الدم.

Transliteration: Raak t-Hus laa veesee taa’ek m’amRa?
Arabic: راك اتحُسْ لآ فيسي تَاعَك مْعَمْرَ؟

English: Do you have problems starting to urinate?
Do you have an urge to urinate but are unable to pass urine?
Transliteration: jeek al-boola oo maa- taqdeRsh edeeRha?

English: You need a tube in your bladder.
Transliteration: laazemlek tweeyoo fee laa veesee taa’ek

English: I am going to insert a tube into your bladder to drain urine.
Transliteration: aana RaayiH andeKhal tweeyoo fee laa veesee taa’ek baash nfaRigh al-bool
Arabic: أنا رَايَحْ انْدَخَل تْوييُوفي لَفيسي تَاعَكْ بَاش نْفَرَغْ البُولْ.

English: This tube will empty the urine from your bladder.
Transliteration: haad at-tweeyoo Raahoo RaayiH eefaRigh al-bool min laa veesee taa’ek
Arabic: هَدَ التْوييُورَاهُو رَايَح يْفَرَغ البول من لَفيسي تَاعَكْ.

English: This tube will feel uncomfortable in you.
Do not eat or drink until the surgery.
Arabic: ما تاكُل ما تشرب حتى البراسيون.

English: Do not eat or drink anything after midnight tonight.
Transliteration: maa-taakul maa-tishRab waaloo ba’d iTnaash taa’ al-leel
Arabic: ما تاكُل ما تشرب والو بعد الطناش تاع الليل.

English: You must stay in this room.
We have to cut your hair off here.
You may get up to go to the toilet.
Transliteration: taqdeR tnooD baash tRooH al-beet aR- RaaHa
Arabic: تَقْدَرْ تْنوضْ بَاشْ تْروحْ لْبيت الراحة.

English: If you need surgery, your stomach must be empty.
Transliteration: wila tis-Haq lopeRaasyon al-me’da taa’ak laazem tkoon faaRgha
Arabic: ولا تَسْحَق لوبيراسيون المعدة تَاعَك لازم تْكون فارغة.

English: We will give you food and drink as soon as it is safe to do so.
Transliteration: na’Teeyoolek taakul oo-tishRab kee tkoon mleeH
Arabic: نَعْطيوْلَك تَاكُل وُ تُشْرُب كي تْكونْ مْليح.

English: Hold up the number of fingers.

Transliteration: washnoo heeya al- mooshkeela aR-Ra- eeseeya?

English: How long have you had the pain?
Show me where the pain started.
Does the pain go to the back?
Does the pain go to the testicles?
Does this pain go to the groin?
Is this the worst pain you ever had?
Transliteration: haad looja’ hoowa aqwa ooja’ SRaa-lek fee Hyaatek?
Arabic: هَدَ الوجَعْ هوأقوى وجع صْرا لك في حياتك؟

English: Is there anything that relieves the pain symptom?
Is there anything that worsens the pain symptom?
Have you seen a doctor or anyone about this?
Transliteration: shaft aT-Tabeeb wila kaash waaHed ‘ala haada?
Arabic: شفت الطبيب ولا كاش واحد على هَدَ؟

English: Are you experiencing loss of appetite?
Are you experiencing numbness or tingling?

English: Is there a medical emergency facility?
We have to establish a safe working environment.
We have to hire medical doctors for this facility.
We have to hire nurses for this facility.
We have to hire office personnel for this facility.
We have to hire a custodian for this facility.
Is the local drinking water potable?

English: Who determined that the water is potable?

We have to set up storage locations for supply materials in the area.

Arabic: أكو أي مدرجات لهبوط الطيارات الصغيرة قريبة منّا؟

English: How many people own motor vehicles in this area?

English: Can you use these roads during the winter?
Transliteration: tigdaroo tista’miloon haT Turuq bish shitaa?

English: Do not stop if convoy is attacked!
Transliteration: laa togaf iThaa inDharab ar ratil!

English: Drive a minimum of 3 kms before stopping.
Transliteration: soog ‘ala il-aqal thalaath keelomatraat gabul maa togaf
Arabic: سوگ على الأقل ثلاث كيلومترات گبل ما توگف

English: Following distance is 100m on open highway.

Arabic: بالطريق السريع إبتعد مسافة 001 متر عن السيارة إلگبلك

Transliteration: ibta’id masaafat Khamseen matir ‘an is sayaara il gablak
Arabic: إبتعد مسافة 05 متر عن السيارة إلگبلك

English: When stopped on the road, keep enough space between vehicles to drive around if required.

Arabic: إذا توگف بالشارع، خلي مسافة کافیة بينك وبين السيارات لتگدر تدور لو تحتاج

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.

Arabic: إذا ضيعت الرتل، خفف وإنتظر لوري الجيش وإمشي وراه

Arabic: لا ترمي أكل أو ماي للإماراتيين

English: No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: la nijis aw wasaaKha bil mu’asker aw ‘ala il manaSaat
Arabic: لا نجس أو وساخة بالمعسكر أو على المنصات

Arabic: دور حول أي لوري خربان بالرتل

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Food is provided at some military camps when available.
Transliteration: yenToon akil ib ba’Dh il mu’askaraat min yeekoon mitwafer
Arabic: ينطون أكل ببعض المعسكرات من يكون متوفر

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.
Transliteration: jeeb wiyaak akil oo maay chetheer

English: If you have to stop for any reason and the convoy continues, wait for help from the military.
Transliteration: iThaa iDhTareet togaf lee-ay sabab wo ir ratil mustamir, intaDhir musaa’ada ‘askareeya
Arabic: إذا إضطريت توگف لأي سبب والرتل مستمر ، إنتظر مساعدة عسكرية

English: They will escort you back into position.
No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: laa tit’aarak aw titjaadal ma’a ay saayeq aaKhar ‘ala mas-ooleeyit ir ratil
Arabic: لا تتعارك أو تتجادل مع أي سايق آخر على مسؤولية الرتل

English: Be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks. (Note: This is an instruction for bobtail drivers.)
Transliteration: koon musta’id lil wogoof wo musaa’adat il loreeyaat il Kharbaana
Arabic: كون مستعد للوگوف ومساعدة اللوريات الخربانة

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: baligh aamer ir ratil ‘an ay mashaakil wiyaa is suwaaq il aaKhareen
Arabic: بلغ آمر الرتل عن أي مشاكل ويا السواق الاخرين

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ isti’maal al muKhadaraat aw il kuHool min itsooq
Arabic: ممنوع إستعمال المخدرات أو الكحول من تسوق

English: Know how to change tires and have proper tools.

Arabic: تعلم شلون تبدل التايرات وخلي وياك العدة المطلوبة

English: Loads, straps, chains, and tires are the drivers’ responsibility.
Transliteration: at taHmeel wo taghyeer al taayaraat mas- ooleeyet as suwaaq

English: Check every time the convoy stops.
Transliteration: ifHaShaa kul mara yogaf ir ratil

Arabic: هون ما فيه شرايك الوتات لكبارات أكٌريبين؟

English: Do you have radio contact with people in other places?
Transliteration: tizhaabaR im’a in naas ilee ivlblaydaat liKhRaat a’la iRaadjo?
Arabic: تجابر مع الناس أللي أفلبليدات لخرات أعلَ أرادو؟

English: Can you use these roads during the winter?
Transliteration: itgid tagbaTh haaTho iTRig zaman ishteh?
Arabic: أتكٌد تكٌبظ هاذو الطرقٌ زمن الشته؟

English: Do not stop if convoy is attacked!
Transliteration: laa itwagev ilaa ‘aad il mawkib mohaazhim!
Arabic: لا أتوكٌف إلا عاد الموكب مهاجم!

English: Drive a minimum of 3 kms before stopping.
Following distance is 100m on open highway.
Transliteration: il masaaveh ilee baynak im’aaha meet mayTaR i’la iTReeg likbeeReh
Arabic: المسافه أللي بينك أمعاه مية ميطر أعلَ الطريقٌ لكبيره.

Transliteration: il masaaveh ilee baynak im’aaha Khamseen mayTaR nigiR id dashRah
Arabic: المسافه أللي بينك أمعاه خمسين ميطر نكٌر أدشره.

English: When stopped on the road, keep enough space between vehicles to drive around if required.
Transliteration: ilaa wagavt v iTReeg, Khalee masaaveh baynak im’a il wataat ilee idooRo yitKhaTaawak
Arabic: إلا وقٌفت في الطريقٌ، خلي مسافه بينك مع الوتات أللي إدورو يتخطاوك.

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.
Transliteration: elayn it’ood maa tayt itRaa’ee v il mawkib, imshee beshoR o Haanee wet iSnaadRah titKhaTaak witlibha
Arabic: إلين أتعود ما تيت أتراعي في الموكب، أمشي بشور وحاني وتْ أصنادره تتخطاك و أتلبها.

English: Do not throw food or water to the locals.
Transliteration: laa tizRig iT’aam wala ilmeh i’la ahil id dashRah
Arabic: لا تزركٌ أطعام وللَ ألمَ أعلَ أهل الدشره.

English: No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: moHaRam kab losaKh o imbaaleet iHTha iSnig iSnaadRah o iblaydaat- hom
Arabic: محرم كب لوسخ وأمباليتْ أحّذَ صنكٌ أصنادره و أبليداتهم.

English: Go around any broken down truck in the convoy.
Transliteration: iz zagnen be ay wateh ikbeeReh KhaasReh v il mawkib
Arabic: أزكٌنن بأي وته أكبيره خاسره فى الموكب.

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Transliteration: deeR iSaanS v il wateh kil maRa itwagev veeha
Arabic: دير إصانص فى الوته كل مره أتوقٌف فيها.

English: Food is provided at some military camps when available.
Transliteration: iT’aam elayn i’ood zhaahiz, yinzhbaR ‘and shee min iSnig iSnaadRah
Arabic: الطعام إلين إعود جاهز، ينجبر عند شي من صنكٌ أصنادره.

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.
Transliteration: zheeb im’aak yaasiR min iT’aam o yaasiR min ilmeh
Arabic: جيب أمعاك ياسر من الطعام وياسر من ألمَ.

English: If you have to stop for any reason and the convoy continues, wait for help from the military.
Transliteration: ilaa ‘aad haamak itwagev il ay sabab o il mawkib mazaal maashee, Haanee iSnaadRah ee’aawnook
Arabic: إلا عاد هامك أتوقٌف لأي سبب و الموكب مزال ماشي، حاني أصنادره إعاونوك.

English: They will escort you back into position.
No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: moHaRmeh id daygeh o iSakeh im’a ishovayRaat laKhRayn i’la liblaayiS v il mawkib
Arabic: محرم أديكٌه و الصكّه مع أشوفيرات لخرين أعلَ لبلايص فى الموكب.

English: Be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks. (Note: This is an instruction for bobtail drivers.)
Transliteration: ‘ood mista’id itwagev o it’aawin ahil il wataat likbaaRaat il KhaasRaat
Arabic: عود مستعد أتوقٌف وتعاون أهل الوتات لكبارات الخاسرات.

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: balagh ay mashaakil im’a ishovayRaat laKhRayn il qaayid il mawkib
Arabic: بلغ أي مشاكل مع شوفيرات لخرين ل قايد الموكب.

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.

ivtaH il baab il waRaanee min vaDhlak

Hold up the number of fingers.

English: If we do not operate, you may die.

Arabic: العمليه خطيره يغير ألاهي أللي لاهِ تجبر أعل أثرها العافيه.

Arabic: أياك ألّ فاهم أنكْ محتاج ألذي العمليه؟

English: We will begin the operation as soon as we can.
Transliteration: laahee nibdo il ‘amaleeyeh v asRa’ waqit iSiH
Arabic: لاهِ نبدأو العمليه ف أسرع وقت إصحْ.

English: This medicine will make you sleep.

Arabic: عندك أي حساسيه خصوصا ضد الدوَ؟

English: Do you have high blood pressure / diabetes or blood sugar control problems?

Arabic: فيك تانسيون وللَ السكر وللَ عندك مشاكل مرض السكر؟

English: We are all working to help you.

Arabic: عندك اي ردتْ فعل أمعاكسة لأي أدوَ؟

Arabic: كلتْ شي ف ست ساعات التاليه؟

English: Is this injury from a landmine?

Arabic: مندرا كانك إلين أخلكٌ ذ أفقدتْ وعيك؟

Everything will be done to make you feel better again.
Transliteration: laahee in’adloolak Thaak kaamil ilee igid yo’adal eeyaak tibRa
Arabic: لاهِ أنعدلولك ذاك كامل اللي إكٌد يُعدل أياك تبرَ.

English: You will soon be up again.
Your condition is serious, but you will get better.
Transliteration: Tha ilKhaalig lak imteen yaghayR idoR tit’aaveh
Arabic: ذ ألخالكٌ لك أمتين يغير أدور تتعافَ.

English: You will get better if you let us take care of you.
Transliteration: idoR it’ood ashbeh elayn itKhaleeneh na’Rovoolak shee
Arabic: أدور أتعود اشبه إلين أتخلينَ نعرفولك شي.

English: It will probably take a long time for you to get better.
Transliteration: maHaqa ‘anak miHtaazh il yaasiR min il waqit eeyaak tibRa
Arabic: محقَ عنك محتاج أل ياسر من الوقت اياك تبرَ.

English: We were able to help you.
We tried, but we could not save this.
Transliteration: Haawilneh yaghayR maa gadayneh insalko Tha
Arabic: حاولنَ يغير ما كٌدينَ أنسلكو ذّ.

English: You will need time to heal.
We will arrange for your transport back to your country.
Transliteration: laahee nitbaaRko im’a izhRaa-at savaRak shoR doltak
Arabic: لاهِ أنتباركو مع إجراءات سفرك شور دولتك.

English: We will send you to another place.
You will return to your unit when you are better.
Transliteration: idoR taRzha’ il Sangtak elayn tabRa

English: I will check back later to see how you are doing.
Transliteration: indoR naRzha’ waqit oKhaR inshowv inta shimaasee
Arabic: أندور نرجع وقت أوخر انشوف أنت شمُاسي.

English: Return tomorrow so we can be sure you get better.
Transliteration: iRzha’ iS SibiH eeyaak nit-akdo ‘anak ibRayt
Arabic: أرجع أصبح أياك نتأكدو عنك أبريتْ.

English: Return in one week so we can be sure you get better.
Arabic: أرجع عاكٌب أسبوع أياك نتأكدو عنك أبريتْ.

English: Do you have any of the following problems?
Transliteration: ‘indak shee min haaThee il mashaakil ilee laahee ingoolak?
Arabic: عندكْ شي من هاذُ المشاكلْ أللي لاهِ أنكٌول لكْ؟

Transliteration: maashee minak dam min ay iblad
Arabic: ماشي منك دم من أي بلد

English: I need to give you some medicine.

Transliteration: ‘is min ishRaab il koHool waqit igbeeTh idweh
Arabic: عس من أشراب الكحولْ وقتْ أكٌبيظ أدوَ.

English: Take on an empty stomach (one hour before or two hours after a meal).
Transliteration: igbiTho i’la liKhweh (saa’a saabig iT’aam wala saa’tayn ‘aagbo)
Arabic: أكٌبظو أعل لخوَ (ساعه سابقٌ الطعام وللَ ساعتين عاكٌبو.)

English: Avoid taking at the same time as dairy products.
Transliteration: ‘is min igbeeTho v navis il waqit im’a shee veeh il liben
Arabic: عسْ من أكٌبيظو ف نفس الوقتْ مع شي فيه أللبنْ.

English: This medicine may change the color of urine or stool.
Transliteration: haaTha idweh igid yeghayaR lawn il bol wala lig’aad
Arabic: هاذ أدوَ إيكٌد يغير لون البول وللَ لكٌعادْ.

English: May cause drowsiness (avoid using dangerous machinery).
Transliteration: igid isabib in’aas (‘is min istiKhdaam il makaayin il KhaTeeRaat)
Arabic: إيكٌد إسبب أنعاسْ (عسْ من أستخدام المكاين الخطيرات.)

Transliteration: gaTaR gaTRah v loThin ilee toozh’ak
Arabic: كٌطر كٌطره ف لوذن اللي توجعكْ.

English: Unwrap and insert one suppository rectally.
Allow to dissolve under tongue without swallowing (sublingual).
Transliteration: Khaleeh iThoob taHit il saan o laa tiSiRTo
Arabic: خليه إذوب تحت أللسان ولا تصرطو.

Transliteration: awzhee’ il kiRsh, shayn laKhlaag, ligThaav
laa eewaRTak il baagee elayn yawveh Tha
Arabic: لا أيورطك الباقٌي إلين يوفَ ذَ.

English: Apply a thin layer to skin.
Do you have any of the following diseases?
Transliteration: veek waaHid min Tho lamRaaDh ilee laahee ingoolak?
Arabic: فيك واحد من ذو لمراض أللي لاهِ أنقٌول لكْ؟

English: How many men are on this ship?

Arabic: من فيه من أجماعتك يتكلم الإنكٌليزيه؟

Do you have any drugs on board?

Keep your hands above your head.

Arabic: مركٌ ذاك أللي ف الباناكْ كامل من فضلكْ.

English: I am going to conduct a search of your person.
Transliteration: anaa laahee in’adel tavteesh le paaSaazhtak
Arabic: أنا لاهي أنعدل تفتيش ل أباصاجتكْ.

Arabic: فرقٌ كرعيك وأركٌب أيديك من فضلكْ.

Arabic: اسمحلي بويَ، هاذ ما مسموح بيه.

English: STOP! Do not proceed beyond this point until authorized by an appointed official.
Transliteration: wagev! laa titKhaTa Thee liblaaSeh elayn tazhbaR liThin min il mas-ool
Arabic: وقٌف! لا تتخط َذي لبلاصه إلين تجبر لذن من المسؤول.

English: This is a United States war ship.
Recommend coming right for a port to port passage.

Arabic: لاهِ أنبدل أتجاهي شور أجيهَ العربيه.

Arabic: إذا وقفت عالطريق، خليّ مسافة كافية بين السيارات لتقدر تلف إذا انجبرت

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.
Transliteration: iTha Daya’t il qaafleh, Khafif wistana shaaHneh ‘askaReeyeh latmuR, walHag-haa
Arabic: إذا ضيّعت القافلة، خفّف واستنى شاحنة عسكريّة لتمر، والحقها

English: Do not throw food or water to the locals.
Transliteration: maa tzit akil aw shuRub la-ahil il manTiqa
Arabic: ما تزت اكل او شرب لأهل المنطقه

English: No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ Ramee lizbaaleh bil mu’askaRaat wa muKhayamaat it tadReeb
Arabic: ممنوع رمي الزبالة بالمعسكرات ومخيمات التدريب

English: Go around any broken down truck in the convoy.
Transliteration: lif ‘an ay shaaHneh im’aTleh bil qaafleh
Arabic: لف عن أي شاحنة معطّلة بالقافلة

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Transliteration: ‘abee banzeen kul maa wagafit ish shaaHneh
Arabic: عبّي بنزين كل ما وقّفت الشاحنة

English: Food is provided at some military camps when available.
Transliteration: beeya’Too akil bi-ba’D il mu’askaRaat iTha kaan mitwafiR
Arabic: بيعطوا اكل ببعض المعسكرات إذا كان متوفر

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.
Transliteration: jeeb ma’ak akil wu maaya ikteeR

English: If you have to stop for any reason and the convoy continues, wait for help from the military.
Transliteration: iTha iDTaRayt itwagif la ay sabab wil qaafleh kamalet TaReeg-haa, istana al musaa’adeh min al jaysh
Arabic: إذا اضطريت توقف لاي سبب والقافلة كمّلت طريقها, استنى المساعدة من الجيش

English: They will escort you back into position.
No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: maa tit-haawish aw titjaadil ma’ ay shoofayR ‘ala il maHal bil qaafleh
Arabic: ما تتهاوش او تتجادل مع أي شوفير على المحل بالقافلة

English: Be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks. (Note: This is an instruction for bobtail drivers.)
Transliteration: koon jaahiz itwagif wit saa’id ish shaaHinaat lim’aTaleh
Arabic: كون جاهز توقف وتساعد الشاحنات المعطلة

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: baligh gaayid il qaafleh ‘an ay mashaakil ma’ ish shofayReeyeh il baageen
Arabic: بلغّ قايد القافلة عن أي مشاكل مع الشوفريّة الباقين

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ toKhad muKhadaRaat aw kuHool wu inta bitsoog
Arabic: ممنوع توخذ مُخدرات او كحول و انت بتسوق

English: Know how to change tires and have proper tools.
Transliteration: it’alam keef itghayiR la’jaal wu Khalee ma’ak il ‘ideh il laazmeh
Arabic: تعلمّ كيف تغيّر العجال وخليّ معك العده اللازمة

English: Loads, straps, chains, and tires are the drivers’ responsibility.
Transliteration: laHmooleh, laHbaal, il janaazeeR wu la’jaal min mas-ooleeyit ish shoofayR
Arabic: الحمولة, الحبال, الجنازير والعجال من مسؤولية الشوفير

English: Check every time the convoy stops.
Transliteration: ifHaS-haa kul maRa bitwagif il qaafleh

English: How many people live in this area?
How many water wells do you have in this area?
Transliteration: kam beeR mayeh fee bi hal manTiqa?

English: Do you have a sewage system in this area?
How far are the latrines from the water wells?
Transliteration: gadaysh ba’eedeh il Hamaamaat beeR ‘an il mayeh?
Arabic: قديّش بعيدة الحمامات عن بير الميّه؟

English: What type of herds graze in this area?
Transliteration: shoo naw’ al mawaashee ilee ibtiR’a bi hal manTiqa?
Arabic: شو نوع المواشي اللي بترعى بهالمنطقة؟

English: Are there any factories in the area?
Where do you get electricity from?
Is there a power plant nearby?
What kind of electric appliances do people use?
Transliteration: ay no’ min aj-heezit il kah-Raba in naas btista’mil?
Arabic: اي نوع من اجهزة الكهربا الناس بتستعمل؟

English: Have there been forest fires in the area?
Transliteration: SaaR fee ay HaRaayig ghaabaat bi hal manTiqa?
Arabic: صار في أي حرايق غابات بهالمنطقة؟

English: Are there any gas pipes around here?
Transliteration: fee KhTooT ghaaz gaReebeh min hon?
Arabic: في خطوط غاز قريبة من هون؟

English: Do you use gas to heat homes around here?
Transliteration: btista’imloo ghaaz la dafoo il labyoot hon?

English: Do you use propane gas tanks?
Where do you get propane gas tanks supplied from?
Is there anyone to inspect home gas appliances?
Transliteration: fee Hada beeyifHaS aj-heezit il ghaaz bi libyoot?
Arabic: في حدا بيفحص اجهزة الغاز بالبيوت؟

English: Is there a water supply system to households?
Transliteration: fee ay neeDhaam la tawReed il mayeh la libyoot?
Arabic: في اي نظام لتوريد الميه للبيوت؟

English: How many people operate the system?
Is it connected to other water supply systems?
Transliteration: hal heeyeh mitaSleh bi jeehaaz ta-meen mayeh thaanee?
Arabic: هل هي متصلة بجهاز تأمين ميّه ثاني؟

English: Where are the sources of raw water?
Is there a water treatment used?
Transliteration: btista’imloo maHaTa la takReeR il mayeh?

English: How many people are needed to keep the system functional?
Transliteration: kam shaKhiS beelzam layKhaloo il jeehaaz shaghaal?
Arabic: كم شخص بلزم ليخلوّا الجهاز شغّال؟

English: We’ve heard that there have been some problems with sewage in this neighborhood.
Transliteration: smi’naa inoo SaaR fee mashaakil bil majaaRee bi hal Hay
Arabic: سمعنا انو صار في مشاكل بالمجاري بهالحي

English: Do you have any problems with your plumbing?
How many toilets do you have in the house?
Do you have a septic tank?
Is there anyone who can fix your sewer?
Transliteration: fee Hada beeyigdaR yeSaliHlak il majaaRee?

English: Have you contacted anyone regarding this problem? If so who?
Transliteration: itaSalit bi Hada ‘ashaan hal mushkeeleh? iTha aa, ma’ meen?
Arabic: إتصلت بحدا عشان هالمشكلة؟ إذا أه، مع مين؟

English: I will report this higher up and see if there is something we can do to fix the sewage problem.
Transliteration: RaH awaSilhaa lal mas-ooleen wa-ashoof iTha binigdaR na’mil shee lanSaliH mushkilt il majaaRee
Arabic: رح أوصّلها للمسؤولين وأشوف إذا بنقدر نعمل أشي لنصلحّ مشكلة المجاري

English: We will contact the sewage company and find out what is being done to correct the problem.
Transliteration: RaH nitaSil bi shiRkit il majaaRee Hata nshoof shoo ‘imloo layzabToo il mushkeeleh
Arabic: رح نتصل بشركة المجاري حتى نشوف شو عملوا ليزبطوا المشكلة

English: How many radios and TVs are in this area?
Transliteration: gadaysh Raadyo wu talafizyon fee bi hal manTiqa?

English: Do you have a radio station in this area?
Do you have a TV station in the area?
Do you have a public announcement system?
Is there a news agency representative nearby?
Transliteration: fee muRaasil la- wakaalit anbaa gaReeb?

English: Where do you buy a newspaper?
What was produced on the farm?
Transliteration: shoo il maHaaSeel ilee antajat-haa il mazRa’a?

English: I will contact the appropriate authorities to investigate this matter.
Transliteration: RaH ataSil bil jeehaat il ma’neeyeh lat taHqeeq bil qaDeeyeh
Arabic: راح اتصل بالجهات المعنيّة للتحقيق بالقضيّة

English: Please know we will assist you.
Transliteration: law samaHt, i’Raf inoo RaH insaa’dak
Arabic: لو سمحت، اعرف انو راح إنساعدك

English: You must allow the local authorities to conduct their investigation.
Transliteration: laazim itKhalee is sulTaat il maHaleeyeh ta’mil it taHqeeq
Arabic: لازم تخلي السلطات المحليّة تعمل التحقيق

English: You must go to the base and speak with an interpreter.
Transliteration: laazim tRooH ‘aal qaa’ideh wu tiHkee ma’ il mutaRjim
Arabic: لازم تروح عالقاعدة وتحكي مع المترجم

English: What is the condition of the property?
Put your hands on the steering wheel and do not move them.
Transliteration: HuT eedayk ‘aal isteeRing wu maa taHaRik-hum

English: Did you know there is a curfew?
Transliteration: kunt ti’Rif inuh fee mani’ tajawul?
Arabic: كنت تعرف إنو في منع تجول؟

English: The streets are not safe right now.
We will escort you to your relatives.
The police station will give you information about curfew.
Transliteration: il maKhfaR RaH ya’Teek ma’loomaat ‘an mani’ it tajawul
Arabic: المخفر رح يعطيك معلومات عن منع التجول

English: May I see your ID, please?
How much money are you carrying?
Do you have a gun under the seat?
Since you broke the law, we have to arrest you.
Transliteration: bimaa inak Khaalaft il gaanoon, laazim niHijzak
Arabic: بما انك خالفت القانون، لازم نحجزك

English: We have to take you to the police station.
You will ride with us to the police station.
Can you help verify the man’s identity?
Transliteration: mumkin itsaa’idnaa nit-akad min haweeyit iz-zalameh?
Arabic: ممكن تساعدنا نتأكد من هوية الزلمه؟

English: Get out of the truck please.
Transliteration: min faDlak inzaal min ash shaaHneh
min faDlak iftaH il baab il Khalfee

English: We need to inspect the cargo.
Where did you get this ammunition?
Who does this ammunition belong to?
We are going to detain you and confiscate your truck.
You will get your truck back if you tell us who you are taking this to.
Transliteration: binRaji’lak shaaHintak iTha gultilnaa lameen aaKhiTh hal laHmooleh
Arabic: بنرجعلك شاحنتك إذا قلتلنا لمين آخذ هالحمولة

English: Is there a road access for cars?
Is there a road access for four- wheel drive?
Transliteration: fee TaReeg la sayaaRaat id dafi’ iR Rubaa’ee?

English: Is there a road access for trucks?
Is the road accessible in the winter?
What is the number of the current population?

Transliteration: kam waaHid min ahil il balad fee hoonaak?
Arabic: كم واحد من اهل البلد في هوناك؟

English: Who is responsible for food distribution?
Is this village used for secondary distribution?
Transliteration: heeyeh il gaRya btista’mil tawzee’ ith thaanawee?

English: Which villages receive assistance from this village?
Transliteration: fee ay guRa btaaKhuTh musaa’adaat min hal gaRya?
Arabic: في أي قرى بتاخذ مساعدات من هالقريه؟

English: How many damaged houses in this village?
Transliteration: gadaysh bayt iDaRaR bi hal gaRyeh?

English: How many unfinished houses in this village?
Transliteration: kam bayt ba’du mish imkamal bi hal gaRya?
Arabic: كم بيت بعده مش مكمل بهالقريه؟

English: Was there any new war damage to buildings since before the conflict?
Transliteration: fee ay KhaRaab jdeed lal binaayaat bisabab il HaRb min gabil iS SiRaa’?
Arabic: في أي خراب جديد للبنايات بسبب الحرب من قبل الصراع؟

English: Is there a school in the village?
Is there a mosque/church in the village?
Is there any source of food available in the village?
Transliteration: fee ay maSdaR lal akil bil gaRya?

English: Let me put you in contact with someone who can help you.
Transliteration: Khaleenee aHuTak ‘al KhaT ma’ shaKhiS beeyigdaR yesaa’dak
Arabic: خليّني احطّك عالخط مع شخص بيقدر يساعدك

English: I will take you to him.
In order to be compensated for damages, you must talk to ___.
Transliteration: Hata toKhiTh ta’weeD ‘an il KhasaayiR, laazim tiHkee ma’ ___
Arabic: حتى توخذ تعويض عن الخساير ، لازم تحكي مع ___

English: Where do you live? / What is your address?
What kind of car is it? (year, make, model)
Transliteration: shoo no’ is seeyaaRa? (ay saneh, ism ish shiRkeh, ay modeyl)
Arabic: شو نوع السيارة؟ (أي سنة ، اسم الشركة، أي موديل)؟

English: Where is your car right now?
Can you bring your car here?
What Civilian Forces’ vehicle damaged your car?
Transliteration: ay seeyaaRit deefaa’ madanee DaRbit seeyaaRtak?
Arabic: أي سيارة دفاع مدني ضربت سيارتك؟

English: What soldiers were involved in the accident?
Transliteration: ay junood kaanoo mitwaRTeen bil Haadith?

English: In order to be compensated for damages, you must fill out this document.
Transliteration: latuHSul ‘ala ta’weeD ‘an il KhasaayiR, laazim it’abee halooRaag
Arabic: لتحصل على تعويض عن الخساير، لازم تعبي هالاوراق

English: In order to be compensated for damages, you must see ___.
Transliteration: Hata t-HaSil ta’weeD ‘an al KhasaayiR laazim itshoof ___
Arabic: حتى تحصل تعويض عن الخساير، لازم تشوف ___

English: Where can we purchase vegetables and fruit?
Transliteration: min wayn bnigdaR nishtaRee KhuDRa wu fawaake?
Arabic: من وين بنقدر نشتري خضره وفواكي؟

English: Where can we purchase bread and grains?
Transliteration: min wayn bnigdaR nishtaRee Khubiz wuHboob?
Arabic: من وين بنقدر نشتري خبز وحبوب؟

English: Where can we purchase dairy products?
Transliteration: min wayn bnigdaR nishtaRee muntajaat il-albaan?
Arabic: من وين بنقدر نشتري منتجات الألبان؟

English: We need to examine the herd.
We need to examine the animals on the farm.
Transliteration: laazim nifHaS il Hayawaanaat bil mazRa’a

English: We need to inspect the slaughterhouse for sanitation.
Transliteration: laazim infatish il maslaKh meeshaan iS SaHa il ‘aameh
Arabic: لازم نفتّش المسلخ مشان الصحة العامة

English: We need to inspect the bakery for sanitation.
Transliteration: laazim infatish il maKhbaz meeshaan iS SaHa il ‘aameh
Arabic: لازم نفتّش المخبز مشان الصحة العامة

English: We need to inspect the dairy plant.
Transliteration: laazim infatish ma’mal il albaan meeshaan iS SaHa il ‘aameh
Arabic: لازم نفتش معمل الألبان مشان الصحة العامة

English: We need to inspect the poultry plant.
Transliteration: laazim infatish mazRa’it ij-jaaj meeshaan iS SaHa il ‘aameh
Arabic: لازم نفتّش مزرعة الجاج مشان الصحة العامة

English: When was the last time these animals were inoculated?
Transliteration: mata aaKhiR maRa hal Hayawaanaat aKhThit maT’oom?
Arabic: متى آخر مره هالحيوانات آخذت مطعوم؟

English: Do they need to be vaccinated?
This food is spoiled, please do not eat it.
Transliteration: haTha il akil KhaRbaan, yaa Rayt maa tokluh
Arabic: هذا الاكل خربان، ياريت ما توكله

English: Are the crops infected with insects?
Are the animals infected with parasites?
We are here to help you.
I do not understand your language.
There is no one available who speaks this language.
Transliteration: maa fee Hada hon yiHkee haay il lugha
Arabic: ما في حدا هون بيحكي هاي اللغة .

English: Try to answer my questions with “yes” or “no.”
Arabic: جرب تجاوبني على أسئلتي باه او لا.

English: Move your head like this for “yes.”
Move your head like this for “no.”
Do you know where you are?
We will try to contact someone from your group.
Transliteration: RaH injaRib nitaSil bi- Hada min jamaa’tak
Arabic: راح نجرب نتصل بحدا من جماعتك.

English: Thank you for talking with me.
I will talk with you again.
Hold up the number of fingers.
I need to clean your wounds.
I am here to help you.
What country were you born in?
Do you have an identity card?
Do you have any bad reactions to medications?
What is the name of the medication that causes bad reactions?
Transliteration: shoo isim id dawa ilee bee’amil-lak Hasaaseeyeh?
Arabic: شو اسم الدوا اللي بيعملك حساسيّة؟

English: Do you have any allergies to medicines?
How many packs of cigarettes do you smoke per day?
Do you have high blood pressure problems?
Transliteration: ‘indak mashaakil bi- DagT id dam il-’aalee?

English: Do you have blood sugar control problems?
Transliteration: ‘indak mashaakil is sayTaRa ‘ala is-sukaR bid dam?
Arabic: عندك مشاكل السيطرة على السكر بالدم؟

English: We will take care of you.
We will try not to hurt you further.
Show me where it hurts worst.
When did you have your last meal?
When was your last bowel movement?
We need to take you to surgery.
If we do not operate, you may die.
Arabic: اذا ما عملنا العمليّة, ممكن تموت.

English: If we do not operate, you may lose this.
Transliteration: iThaa maa ‘amilnaa il ‘amaleeyeh, mimkin tiKhsaR haaTha
Arabic: اذا ما عملنا العمليّة, ممكن تخسر هذا.

English: The operation is dangerous, but it is the only way to help you.
Transliteration: il ‘amaleeyeh KhiTRa, bas heeyeh iT TaReega il waHeedeh latsaa’dak
Arabic: العملية خطرة, بس هي الطريقة الوحيدة لتساعدك.

English: Do you understand that you need this surgery?
We want your permission before we operate on you.
Transliteration: bidnaa mwaafagtak gabil maa ni’mal-lak il ‘amaleeyeh
Arabic: بدنا موافقتك قبل ما نعملكّ العملية.

English: We will begin the operation as soon as we can.
Transliteration: RaH inbalish il ‘amaleeyeh bi-asRa’ wagit mumkin
Arabic: رح نبلشّ العمليّة بأسرع وقت ممكن.

English: This medicine will make you sleep.
Do you have any allergies, especially to medications?
Do you have high blood pressure / diabetes or blood sugar control problems?
Transliteration: ‘indak mashaakil is sayTaRa ‘aa DaghiT id dam wis sukaRee?
Arabic: عندك مشاكل السيطرة عضغط الدم والسكري؟

English: We are all working to help you.
Help us take care of you.
We have to remove your clothes.
Do you have any bad reactions to any medicine?
Have you eaten food in the past six hours?
Transliteration: akalt ishee bis sit saa’aat il maaDyeh?

English: Is this injury from a landmine?
Transliteration: haay il iSaabeh min lughum aRDee?

English: Is this from a vehicle crash?
Did a person do this to you?
Did you lose consciousness after this happened?
Transliteration: ghayabit ba’id maa SaaR il Haadith?

English: Did you lose more than this much blood?
Point to all the parts of your body that hurt.
Does it hurt when I do this?
Did you inhale any smoke or very hot air?

Transliteration: haaTha RaH yisaa’id Did il ilteehaab

English: I have to put a small needle in you here.
We need to give you fluid.
We need to give you blood.
I need to put a tube into your throat.
This tube will help you breathe better.
Transliteration: haaTha il baRbeesh RaH yisaa’dak titnafas aHsan
Arabic: هذا البربيش راح يساعدك تتنفس احسن.

Transliteration: haaTha il baRbeesh mumkin yikoon muz’ij

English: I need to put a tube through your nose to your stomach.
Transliteration: bidee aHuT baRbeesh min munKhaaRak la mi’adtak
Arabic: بدي احط بربيش من منخارك لمعدتك.

English: You need to swallow while I put this tube in your nose.
Transliteration: laazim tibla’ Reegak wu anaa ‘am baHuT il baRbeesh bi minKhaaRak
Arabic: لازم تبلع ريقك وانا عمبحط البربيش بمنخارك.

English: Drink this while I gently place the tube into your nose.
Transliteration: ishRab haaTha wu anaa ‘am baHuT il baRbeesh ‘amah-lee bi munKhaaRak
Arabic: اشرب هذا وانا عمبحط البربيش عمهلي بمنخارك .

English: This tube will drain your stomach.
I have to put a small tube into your neck to give you fluid.
Transliteration: laazim aHuT baRbeesh iSgheeR bi Ragibtak laa a’Teek sawaa-il
Arabic: لازم احط بربيش صغير برقبتك لاعطيك سوائل.

English: I need to put a tube in your chest.
This needle will release the air from your chest.
Transliteration: haaThee il ibReh RaH itKhafif iD DaghiT ‘an SidRak
Arabic: هذي الابرة رح تخفف الضغط عن صدرك.

English: I need to cut your skin.
We have to restrain you for your safety.
You have been burned by a chemical.
We need to wash the chemicals from your skin.
Transliteration: laazim nighsil il mawaad il keemaaweeyeh ‘an jismak
Arabic: لازم نغسّل المواد الكيماويه عن جسمك.

English: You will need to be completely washed.
Hold this dressing and apply pressure.
I need to splint your arm.
I need to splint your leg.
I am applying a tourniquet to stop the bleeding.
Transliteration: RaH aHuT DaghiT la awagif in nazeef

English: Do you have problems starting to urinate?
Do you have an urge to urinate but are unable to pass urine?
Transliteration: bitHis inak bidak itbawil bas mush gaadiR?
Arabic: بتحس انك بدك تبول بس مشقادر؟

English: Do you have any pain with urination?
You need a tube in your bladder.
I am going to insert a tube into your bladder to drain urine.
Transliteration: bidee adaKhil- lak baRbeesh la- mathaantak la-afaDee il bol
Arabic: بدي ادخلك بربيش لمثانتك لأفضي البول.

English: This tube will empty the urine from your bladder.
This tube will feel uncomfortable in you.
Do not eat or drink until the surgery.
Transliteration: maa tokil walaa tishRab lawagit il ‘amaleeyeh
Arabic: ما توكل ولا تشرب لوقت العملية.

English: Do not eat or drink anything after midnight tonight.
Transliteration: maa tokil walaa tishRab ay ishee ba’ad nuS il layl
Arabic: ما توكل ولا تشرب أي اشي بعد نص الليل.

English: You must stay in this room.
We have to cut your hair off here.
You may get up to go to the toilet.
We cannot give you anything to eat or drink.
Transliteration: maa bnigdaR na’Teek laa akil walaa shuRub
Arabic: ما بنقدر نعطيك لا اكل ولا شرب.

English: If you need surgery, your stomach must be empty.
Transliteration: iThaa bidak ‘amaleeyeh, mi’adtak laazim itkoon faaDyeh
Arabic: اذا بدّك عملية, معدتك لازم تكون فاضيه.

English: We will give you food and drink as soon as it is safe to do so.

Transliteration: maa itwa-if iZaa it’aRaDit il aafleh lehozhoom!
Arabic: ما توقّف إذا تعرّضت القافلة لهجوم!

English: Drive a minimum of 3 kms before stopping.
Transliteration: soo ‘aal-aleeleh tlaatee keelometeR abel maa itwa-if
Arabic: سوق عالقليلة تلاتي كيلومتر قبل ما توقّف.

English: Following distance is 100m on open highway.
Transliteration: ‘aalotistRaad Khaleek ba’eed meeyet meteR ‘an is seeyaaRa il idaamak
Arabic: عالاوتستراد خليكّ بعيد مية متر عن السيارة القدّامك.

Transliteration: be-alib il balad Khaleek ba’eed Khamseen meteR ‘an is seeyaaRa il idaamak
Arabic: بقلب البلد خليكّ بعيد خمسين متر عن السيارة القدّامك .

English: When stopped on the road, keep enough space between vehicles to drive around if required.
Transliteration: iZaa wa-afit ‘aal TaRee, Khalee masaafeh kaafyeh bayn al seeyaaRaat lati-deR tidawiR iZaa iDTaRayt
Arabic: إذا وقفت عالطريق، خليّ مسافة كافية بين السيارات لتقدر تدوّر إذا إضطريت .

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.
Transliteration: iZaa Daya’it il aafleh, Khafif winTooR shaaHneh ‘askaReeyeh latimRu, wa il Ha-haa
Arabic: إذا ضيعّت القافلة، خفّف وإنطور شاحنة عسكريةّ لتمرق، وإلحقها.

English: Do not throw food or water to the locals.
No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ Ramee al nefaayaat bil mu’askaRaat wa muKhayamaat al tadReeb
Arabic: ممنوع رمي النفايات بالمعسكرات ومخيمات التدريب.

English: Go around any broken down truck in the convoy.
Transliteration: dawbil ‘an ay shaaHneh im’aTaleh bil aafleh
Arabic: دوبل عن أي شاحنة معطّلة بالقافلة.

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Transliteration: ‘abee banzeen kel maa wa-afit al shaaHneh
Arabic: عبيّ بنزين كل ما وقّفت الشاحنة.

English: Food is provided at some military camps when available.
Transliteration: ba’aD al mu’askaRaat bitwazi’ akel iZaa kaan mitwafeR ‘indhaa
Arabic: بعض المعسكرات بتوزّع أكل إذا كان متوفر عندها.

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.
Transliteration: zheeb ma’ak akel wu maay zeeyaadeh

English: If you have to stop for any reason and the convoy continues, wait for help from the military.
Transliteration: iZaa iDTaRayt itwa-if lee ay sabab wil aafleh kamalet TaRee-haa, inTooR al musaa’adeh min al zhaysh
Arabic: إذا اضطريت توقف لأي سبب والقافلة كمّلت طريقها ، إنطور المساعدة من الجيش.

English: They will escort you back into position.
No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: maa titKhaana ma’ ay shofayR ‘ala maRkazak bil aafleh
Arabic: ما تتخانق مع أي شوفير على مركزك بالقافلة.

English: Be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks. (Note: This is an instruction for bobtail drivers.)
Transliteration: koon musta’id itwa-if wit saa’id al shaaHenaat al mu’aTaleh
Arabic: كون مستعد توقف وتساعد الشاحنات المعطلة.

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: baligh aayed il aafleh ‘an ay mashaakel ma’ al shofayReeyeh il baa-een
Arabic: بلغّ قايد القافلة عن أي مشاكل مع الشوفريةّ الباقين.

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ isti’maal al muKhadaRaat aw al kuHool inta wu ‘am bitsoo
Arabic: ممنوع إستعمال المخدرات أو الكحول إنت وعم بتسوق.

English: Know how to change tires and have proper tools.
Transliteration: it’alam keef itghayeR al doolaab wu Khalee ma’ak al ‘ideh al laazmeh
Arabic: تعلمّ كيف تغيرّ الدولاب وخليّ معك العدة اللازمة.

English: Loads, straps, chains, and tires are the drivers’ responsibility.
Transliteration: al Homooleh wal RabaTaat wal zhanaazeeR wal dawaaleeb min mas- ooleeyit al shofayR
Arabic: الحمولة والربطات والجنازير والدواليب من مسؤولية الشوفير .

English: Check every time the convoy stops.
Transliteration: itfaHaS il shaaHneh kel maRa bitwa-if il aafleh
Arabic: تفحّص الشاحنة كل مرة بتوقف القافلة.

English: How many people live in this area?
How many water wells do you have in this area?
Transliteration: kam beeR maay fee behaal manTa-a?

English: Do you have a sewage system in this area?
How far are the latrines from the water wells?
Transliteration: adaysh ba’eed imkab al neefaayaat ‘an beeR al maay?
Arabic: قديش بعيد مكب النفايات عن بير المي؟

English: What type of herds graze in this area?
Transliteration: shoo naw’ al mawaashee ilee ibtiR’aa behaal manTa-a?
Arabic: شو نوع المواشي إللي بترعى بهالمنطقة؟

English: Are there any factories in the area?

Transliteration: ay naw’ min al azh- heza al kahRabaa- eeya beyesta’melo in naas?
Arabic: أي نوع من الإجهزة الكهربائية بيستعملوا الناس؟

Arabic: صار في أي حريق غابات بالمنطقة؟

English: Are there any gas pipes around here?

English: Do you use propane gas tanks?

Arabic: في حدا ليفحص أجهزة الغاز بالبيوت؟

English: Is there a water supply system to households?

English: Is it connected to other water supply systems?
Transliteration: hal heeyeh mutiSleh be Khizanaat maay taanee?
Arabic: هل هي متصلة بخزّانات مي تاني؟

English: Where are the sources of raw water?

English: Is there a water treatment used?
How many people are needed to keep the system functional?

Arabic: سمعنا إنو صار في مشاكل بالمجارير بهالحي.

English: Do you have any problems with your plumbing?

Arabic: لازم تخلي السلطات المحليةّ تقوم بالتحقيق .

English: What is the condition of the property?

min faDlak iftaaH il baab il Khilfaanee

English: You need to sleep as much as the child does.

English: Bring your child back here tomorrow.

itzhanab il kuHool wu inta ‘amtaaKhud id dawaa

English: I do not speak Libyan dialect.
Do you have any identification papers?
Are there armed men near here?
Don’t push! We have plenty of food.

Are there any hotels near here?

English: Are there any restaurants near here?

English: We need ___ gallons of potable water.

English: Thank you for talking with me.
I will talk with you again.
What country were you born in?
Do you have an identity card?
How many people live in this area?
Transliteration: gidaash waaHid yuskun fee haadi il-manTiqa?
Arabic: قداش واحد يسكن فى هاذي المنطقه؟

English: Who is the leader of this community?

English: Are there schools here for the children?

Arabic: لازم انشغل موظف مكتب في هذا المركز

Transliteration: hal il-maraakiz il- maHaleeya wa-il- afraad yigdiroo yi’aaljoo il-aDraar il-Haaleeya beedoon musaa’ada amreekeeya?
Arabic: هل المراكز المحليه والافراد يقدرو يعالجو الاضرار الحاليه بدون مساعده امريكيه؟

Arabic: علينا ان نجهز مكان تخزين المعدات في هاذه المنطقة

Arabic: هل فيه وسائل مواصلات في هاذي المنطقه؟

Transliteration: hal fee maTaar greeb min eh-ney?

Transliteration: hal fee mahaabiT li- Tayaaraat il-SgheeRa greeb?
Arabic: هل فيه مهابط للطيارات الصغيرة اقريب؟

Transliteration: hal fee KhuTooT anaabeeb fee haadee il-manTiqa?

Transliteration: hal fee shareekaat lish- shaaHeenaat greeba min eh-ney?
Arabic: هل فيه شركات للشاحنات قريبه من هني؟

English: Do not stop if convoy is attacked!
Drive a minimum of 3 kms before stopping.
Transliteration: soog bisur’it tlaata keelomiter gabil il- tawaguf

English: Following distance is 100m on open highway.
Transliteration: il-masaafa beyn sl- sayaaraat fee iT-Turuq il-’aama meeyat miter
Arabic: المسافة بين السيارات في الطرق العامه 100 متر

Transliteration: il-masaafe beyn is- sayaaraat fee il-mudun Khamseen miter
Arabic: المسافة بين السيارات في المدن 50 متر

English: When stopped on the road, keep enough space between vehicles to drive around if required.
Transliteration: ‘indmaa yatawaqif ir- ratil ‘aley iT-Treeg itrik masaafa kaafiya beyn is-sayaaraat baash tastaTee’ il-Haraka eeda taTalib il-amr
Arabic: عندما يتوقف الرتل على الطريق اترك مسافة كافية بين السيارات باش تستطيع الحركه اذا تطلب الامر

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.
Transliteration: eeda faqat roo-yit ir-ratil Khafif is-sur’a wa-ntaDir Hata tmur ‘aleyk il-shaaHina il- ’askareeya oo-ba’deyn itbaHaa
Arabic: اذا فقدت رؤية الرتل خفف السرعة وانتظر حتى تمر عليك الشاحنه العسكريه وبعدين اتبعها

English: Do not throw food or water to the locals.
Transliteration: matarmeesh faDalaat iT-Ta’aam aw il- miyaa li is-sukaan il- maHaleeyeen
Arabic: ما ترميش فضلات الطعام او المياه للسكان المحليين

English: No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ qadaf oo- ramee il-qoomaama fee il-mu’askaraat aw il-manaSaat
Arabic: ممنوع قذف ورمي القمامه في المعسكرات او المنصات

English: Go around any broken down truck in the convoy.
Transliteration: imshee Hawl ay shaaHina ‘aTlaana fee ir-ratil
Arabic: امشي حول اى شاحنة عطلانه في الرتل

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Food is provided at some military camps when available.
Transliteration: il-akil mawjood fee ba’iD il-mu’askaraat aamta tkoon mitwafer
Arabic: الاكل موجود في بعض المعسكرات امتى تكون متوفر

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.
If you have to stop for any reason and the convoy continues, wait for help from the military.
Transliteration: kaan laazmik toogef lee-ay sabab wa ir- ratil mustamiR intaDir il-musaa’ada il- ’askareeya
Arabic: كان لازمك اتوقف لاي سبب والرتل مستمر انتظر المساعده العسكريه

English: They will escort you back into position.
No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ il-mushaajara aw il-jeedaal ma’a ay saa-ig atnaa wujoodik fee ir-ratil
Arabic: ممنوع المشاجرة او الجدال مع اي سائق اثناء وجودك في الرتل

English: Be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks. (Note: This is an instruction for bobtail drivers.)
Transliteration: koon musta’id lil- wuqoof lee-musaa’adit ay suwaag shaaHina ‘aTlaana
Arabic: كن مستعد للوقوف لمساعدة اي سواق شاحنة عطلانه

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: ursil it-taqaareer ‘an is- saa-iqeen il-aaKhareen ila aamiR ir-ratil

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.

Arabic: ممنوع تعاطي الخمور والمخدرات اثناء السواقه

English: Know how to change tires and have proper tools.
Transliteration: a’rif keef taghayir il- gomaat wi-ykoon ‘indik il-mu’idaat il-laazima
Arabic: اعرف كيف تغير القومات و يكون عندك المعدات اللازمه

English: Loads, straps, chains, and tires are the drivers’ responsibility.
Transliteration: il-Humoola wa ish- shad wa is-slaasil wa il-gomaat mas-ooleeyit is-suwaageen
Arabic: الحموله والشد والسلاسل والقومات مسئولية السواقين

English: Check every time the convoy stops.
How many people live in this area?
Transliteration: gidaash waaHid yuskun fee haadee il- manTiqa?
Arabic: قداش واحد يسكن في هاذي المنطقه؟

English: How many water wells do you have in this area?

English: How far are the latrines from the water wells?

English: Are there any factories in the area?

English: Where do you get propane gas tanks supplied from?

English: How many people operate the system?
Transliteration: gidaash waaHid yashtaghil fee haadee il-maHaTa?

English: Is it connected to other water supply systems?

Arabic: هل هي متصلة بمحطه تزويد مياه ثانيه؟

English: Where are the sources of raw water?
Is there a water treatment used?

Transliteration: gidaash waaHid yiboo lil-HeefaaD ‘aley il- manDooma?
Arabic: قداش واحد يبو ا للحفاظ على المنظومه؟

English: We’ve heard that there have been some problems with sewage in this neighborhood.
Transliteration: sima’naa inoo fee mashaakil fee il- majaaree fee haada l-Hay
Arabic: سمعنا انه فيه مشاكل في المجاري في هذا الحي

English: Do you have any problems with your plumbing?
How many toilets do you have in the house?
Do you have a septic tank?
Is there anyone who can fix your sewer?
Have you contacted anyone regarding this problem? If so who?
Transliteration: itaSalt bee-ay waaHid baKhSooS haadee il- mushkila? eeda taSalt bee-Had ishkoon hoowa?
Arabic: اتصلت باي واحد بخصوص هاذي المشكلة؟ اذا اتصلت بحد اشكون هو؟

English: I will report this higher up and see if there is something we can do to fix the sewage problem.
Transliteration: bnarfa’ taqreer lee- jeeha a’la wa-nshoof law fee Haaja nigdiroo ndeerooha baash inSalHoo mushkilit il- majaaree
Arabic: بنرفع تقرير لجهة اعلى ونشوف لو فيه حاجه نقدروا نديروها باش نصلحوا مشكلة المجاري

Transliteration: binataSil bee-shareekit il-majaaree wa-nshoof shin daaroo baash yiHiloo il-mushkila
Arabic: بنتصل بشركة المجاري ونشوف شن داروا باش يحلو المشكله

Transliteration: gidaash fee raadiyo oo- televizyon fee haadee il-manTiqa?
Arabic: قداش فيه راديو وتلفزيون في هاذي المنطقه؟

Transliteration: hal fee maHaTit eedaa’a fee haadee il- manTiqa?
Arabic: هل فيه محطة اذاعه في هاذي المنطقه؟

English: Do you have a TV station in the area?
Arabic: عندكم محطة تيليفزيون في هاذي المنطقه؟

English: Do you have a public announcement system?

Transliteration: hal fee mumatil lee- wakaalit inbaa greeb min eh-ney?
Arabic: هل فيه ممثل لوكالة انباء قريب من هني؟

English: Where do you buy a newspaper?
What was produced on the farm?

Transliteration: tawaa nataSil bij- jeehaat il-munaasiba baash yiHaqiqoo fee il-mawDoo’
Arabic: توا نتصل بالجهات المناسبه باش يحققوا في الموضوع

English: Please know we will assist you.
Transliteration: min faDlik laazim ti’raf in aHney binsaa’dik
Arabic: من فضلك لازم تعرف ان احنى بنساعدك

English: You must allow the local authorities to conduct their investigation.
Transliteration: laazim tKhalee is- sulTaat il-maHaleeya yijroo taHqeeqaat-hum
Arabic: لازم تخلّي السلطات المحليه يجروا تحقيقاتهم

English: You must go to the base and speak with an interpreter.
Transliteration: laazim timshee lil- qaa’ida oo-titkalim ma’a mutarjim
Arabic: لازم تمشي للقاعده وتتكلم مع مترجم

English: What is the condition of the property?
Put your hands on the steering wheel and do not move them.
Arabic: حط ايديك على الدومان وما تتحركش
منع التجول ما زال ساري المفعول

English: Did you know there is a curfew?
Transliteration: hal ta’rif inu fee mani’ it-tajawul?
Arabic: هل تعرف ان فيه منع تجول؟

English: The streets are not safe right now.
We will escort you to your relatives.
The police station will give you information about curfew.
Transliteration: markaz il-boolees bya’Teek ma’loomaat ‘aley mani’ it-tajawul
Arabic: مركز البوليس بيعطيك معلومات على منع التجول

English: May I see your ID, please?
How much money are you carrying?
Do you have a gun under the seat?
Transliteration: hal im’aak bundooqeeya taHt il- kursee?
hal inta daas ay shey mamnoo’?
Arabic: هل انت داس اي شيىء ممنوع؟

English: Since you broke the law, we have to arrest you.
Transliteration: li-anik Khaalift il- qaanoon laazim inshidook

English: We have to take you to the police station.
You will ride with us to the police station.
Can you help verify the man’s identity?
Transliteration: tigdir tsaa’id fee it-ta- keed min haweeyit ir- raajil?
Arabic: تقدر تساعد في التأكيد من هوية الراجل؟

English: Get out of the truck please.
We need to inspect the cargo.
Where did you get this ammunition?
Who does this ammunition belong to?
We are going to detain you and confiscate your truck.
You will get your truck back if you tell us who you are taking this to.
Transliteration: binraj’oolik shaaHintik eeda gultilnaa lishkoon waaKhid ish-shaaHina haadee
Arabic: بنرجعولك شاحنتك اذا قلتلنا لشكون واخذ الشاحنة هاذي

English: Is there a road access for cars?
Is there a road access for four-wheel drive?
Is there a road access for trucks?
Is the road accessible in the winter?
What is the number of the current population?
Who is responsible for food distribution?
Is this village used for secondary distribution?
Transliteration: hal il-qarya haadee mustaKhidma lit- tawzee’ ith-thaanawee?
Arabic: هل هاذي القريه مستخدمه للتوزيع الثانوي؟

English: Which villages receive assistance from this village?
Transliteration: shkoon il-jeeha ilee tastalim minhaa il- musaa’adaat min haadee il-qarya?
Arabic: شكون الجهه اللي تستلم منها المساعدات من هاذي القريه؟

English: How many damaged houses in this village?
Transliteration: gidaash manzil Khaareb fee haadee il-qarya?

We will protect your privacy as much as we can.
Push now as hard as you can.
We will take good care of the baby.

Let us examine your child in private.
Your child will get better soon.
This medicine will help your child.
Has your child passed urine today?
Has your child passed any stool today?
Did your child pass any stool yesterday?
Has your child had any diarrhea?
Your child will be ill for a long time.

Arabic:

المحلية في اداء واجباتها

Transliteration:
hal tistaKhdimoon al
ajhiza al laasilkeeya?

English:
Is there a medical
facility nearby?

Are there any doctors

hal fee ay Tabeeb fee

Arabic:

المنطقة؟

How many beds

Arabic:

Arabic:

Arabic:

We would like to

nabee nitikalam ma’

Arabic:

We would like to

nabee nitikalam ma’

Arabic:

English:
Is there a medical

We have to establish
a safe working
environment.

We have to hire

this facility.
Transliteration:
niHtaaj in’ayin aTibaa
Iee haaTha al markaz

English:
We have to hire nurses
for this facility.
Transliteration:
niHtaaj in’ayin
mumariDhaat lee
haaTha al markaz

English:
We have to hire office
personnel for this
facility.
Transliteration:
niHtaaj in’ayin
muwaDhafeen lee
haaTha al markaz

English:
We have to hire a
custodian for this
facility.
Transliteration:
niHtaaj in’ayin ‘imaal
naDhaafa lee haaTha

Arabic:

Arabic:

Transliteration:

Arabic:

Who is in charge of

Arabic:

Do you have a map of

We will provide

Transliteration:
raaH nisaa’idkum ‘ala

manTiqa
Arabic:

English:
Can you provide a

mumkin ti’Teena

English:
Do you have any
machinery for road

‘indikum ay mu’idaat lee
binaa aT Turuq?

English:
Do you have any
machinery for road
repairs?
Transliteration:
‘indikum ay mu’idaat lee
taSleeH aT Turuq?

We have to set up

niHtaaj mawaaqi’ lee

tamween fee haaThee

Arabic:

Are there any railroad

hal fee sikat Hadeed fee

Arabic:

Do you have

fee ‘indikum munsha-
aat muwaaSalaat fee

Arabic:

Are there any landing

Sagheera?
Arabic:

Arabic:

Arabic:

Is the traffic heavy in

Transliteration:
hal fee zaHmat sayr fee

Arabic:

Are there bus lines or

hal fee baaSaat aw

amaakin thaaneeya?
Arabic:
هل في باصات أو
قطارات تسافر لاماكن

Do these roads get

hal yejeekum thalij

haaThee aT Turuq?
Arabic:
هل يجيكم ثلج في الشتا

English:
How many people own

area?
Transliteration:
kam min an naas
‘indihum sayaaraat fee
haaThee al manTiqa?
Arabic:
كم من الناس عندهم
سيارات في هذي
المنطقة؟

Transliteration:
hal fee sharikaat
shaaHinaat naqil
qareeba?
Arabic:
هل في شركات شاحنات
نقل قريبة؟

English:
Do you have radio
contact with people in

Transliteration:
hal me’kum itiSaal bil
laasilkee ma’ al amaakin
ath thaaneeya?
Arabic:
هل معكم اتصال بالاسلكي
مع الاماكن الثانية؟

English:
Can you use these

tagdroon tistaKhdmoon
haaThee aT Turuq fish
shitaa?
Arabic:
تقدرون تستخدمون هذي
الطرق في الشتا؟

English:
Do not stop if convoy

Transliteration:
laa twagifoon iThaa al
gaafila ta’araDhat lin
neeran!
Arabic:
لا توقفون اذا القافلة

English:
Drive a minimum of 3
kms before stopping.
Transliteration:
istimir bis siwaaga lee
thalaathat keelomitraat
‘ala al aqal gabil maa
tigaf
Arabic:
استمر بالسواقة لثلاثة
كيلومترات على الاقل قبل

English:
Following distance

highway.
Transliteration:
al masaafa al faaSila
hee meeyat mitir ‘ala aT
Tareeg as saree’
Arabic:
المسافة الفاصلة هي مية
متر على الطريق السريع

Transliteration:
daaKhil al medeena al
mesaafa al faaSila hee
Khamseen mitir
Arabic:
داخل المدينة المسافة
الفاصلة هي خمسين متر

English:
When stopped on the
road, keep enough
space between
vehicles to drive

Transliteration:
yom towagifoon fee aT
Tareeg, Khalee mesaafa
bayn al ‘arabaat Hata
tagdar tideywur iThaa
iHtaajt
Arabic:
يوم توقفون في الطريق ،
خلي مسافة بين العربات

English:
If you lose sight of
the convoy, slow
down and wait for a
military truck to pass

Transliteration:
iThaa maa ‘aad tagdar
tushoof al qaafila, Khafif
as sur’a wintiThir lee
sayaara ‘askareeya Hata
ti’adaak witba’ha
Arabic:
اذا ما عاد تقدر تشوف
القافلة، خفف السرعة
وانتظر لسيارة عسكرية
حتى تعداك واتبعها

English:
Do not throw food or
water to the locals.
Transliteration:
laa ti’Tee akil aw maya lil
sikaan al maHaleeyeen
Arabic:
لا تعطي اكل أو مية للسكان

English:
No littering or
dumping trash on
military camps or
staging areas.
Transliteration:
la tarmee zibaala
fee al mu’askaraat al
‘askareeya aw amaakin

Arabic:
لا ترمي زبالة في
المعسكرات العسكرية أو
اماكن الاصطفاف

English:
Go around any
broken down truck in
the convoy.
Transliteration:
ta’ada ay aaleya
mit’aTila min al qaafila
Arabic:
تعدى أي ألية متعطلة من
القافلة

English:
Fuel vehicle every
time vehicle stops.
Transliteration:
a’id at tazawid fee al
wuqood kul mara tuwagif
feeha al mudara’a
Arabic:
اعد التزود في الوقود كل
مرة توقف فيها المدرعة

English:
Food is provided at
some military camps

Transliteration:
al akil yukoon
mitwafir fee ba’aDh
al mu’askaraat al
‘askareeya
Arabic:
الاكل يكون متوفر في بعض
المعسكرات العسكرية

English:
Bring plenty of food
and water with you.
Transliteration:
jib me’ik akil wu maya
kitheera
Arabic: جب معك اكل و مية كثيرة

English:
If you have to stop

continues, wait for
help from the military.
Transliteration:
iThaa laazim tiwagif
lee-ay sabab wal gaafila

‘askareeya
Arabic:
اذا لازم توقف لأي سبب و
القافلة مستمرة في الحركة ،
انتظر المساعدة العسكرية

English:
They will escort you

No fighting or arguing
with any other driver

convoy.
Transliteration:
mamnoo’ al mujaadala
ma’ ay saayig aaKhar
‘ala ad dor fee al qaafila
Arabic:
ممنوع المجادلة مع أي
سايق اخر على الدور في
القافلة

Be prepared to stop

down trucks. (Note:
This is an instruction for

Transliteration:
kun ‘ala isti’daad lil
tawagif wa musaa’adat
ash shaaHinaat al
muta’aTila
Arabic:
كن على استعداد للتوقف
ومساعدة الشاحنات

English:
Report any problems

Transliteration:
baligh gaayid al gaafila
‘an ay mashaakil ma’
as sawaageen ath
thaaneen
Arabic:
بلغ قايد القافلة عن أي
مشاكل مع السواقيين

English:
No drug or alcohol

Transliteration:
mamnoo’ istiKhdaam

kuHool wagit as siwaaga
Arabic:
ممنوع استخدام المخدرات
أو الكحول وقت السواقة

Know how to change

Transliteration:
ta’alam wishlon tighayir

al ‘ida al laazima
Arabic:
تعلم وشلون تغير البنشر و
جب معك العدة الازمة

Loads, straps,

Transliteration:
al Humoola wal Hibaal

kafaraat hee muhimat as

Arabic:
الحمولة و الحبال و
السلاسل والكفرات هي

English:
Check every time the

Transliteration:
tifagad al ‘araba kil mara

Arabic:
تفقد العربة كل مرة توقف
فيها القافلة

English:
How many people live

kam waaHid ye’eesh

English:
How many water

kam ‘adad al aabaar

manTiqa?
Arabic:
كم عدد الابار اللي عندكم في

English:
Do you have a

How far are the

wish al mesaafa bayn al
Hamaamaat wa aabaar

Arabic:
وش المسافة بين الحمامات

English:
What type of herds

wish anwaa’ al

Arabic:
وش انواع المواشي اللي

Are there any

hal fee ay maSaani’ fee

Arabic:
هل في أي مصانع في
المنطقة؟

English:
Where do you get

hal fee maHaTat

hina?
Arabic:
هل في محطة كهربا قريبة

What kind of electric

Transliteration:
wish anwaa’ al ajhiza

Arabic:
وش انواع الاجهزة

Have there been

hal HaSalat Haraayig

al manTiga?
Arabic:
هل حصلت حرايق غابات

hal tistaKhdimoon al

Arabic:
هل تستخدمون الغاز للتدفئة

Transliteration:
hal tistaKhdimoon al

English:
Do you use propane

Where do you get
propane gas tanks

Transliteration:
hal fee aHad yifatish
‘ala ajhizat al ghaaz fee
beyootikum?
Arabic:
هل في احد يفتش على
اجهزة الغاز في بيوتكم؟

English:
Is there a water

How many people

kam ‘adad al ashKhaaS
alee yeshaghiloon ash
shabaka?
Arabic:
كم عدد الاشخاص اللي

English:
Is it connected to

Transliteration:
hal hee marbooTa

Arabic:
هل هي مربوطة بشبكات
مية ثانية؟

English:
Where are the

Transliteration:
wish maSaadir al
maya aT Tabee’eeya
‘indikum?

English:
Is there a water
treatment used?
Transliteration:
hal tistaKhdimoon
takreer mayat aS Sarf?

English:
How many people are

system functional?
Transliteration:
kam ‘adad al ashKhaaS
al maTloobeen lee
tashgheel ash shabaka?
Arabic:
كم عدد الاشخاص
المطلوبين لتشغيل الشبكة؟

English:
We’ve heard that
there have been
some problems

neighborhood.
Transliteration:
simi’na ina fee
meshaakil fee aS
Sarf aS SiHee fee
Haaratkum
Arabic:
سمعنا انه في مشاكل في
الصرف الصحي في حارتكم

English:
Do you have any
problems with your
plumbing?

How many toilets
do you have in the
house?
Transliteration:
kam ‘adad al
Hamaamaat fee al bayt?

English:
Do you have a septic
tank?

Is there anyone who
can fix your sewer?
Transliteration:
fee aHad yigdar yiSaliH
al majaaree?

English:
Have you contacted
anyone regarding this
problem? If so who?
Transliteration:
hal kalamtum aHad ‘an
al mushkila? min hoo?
Arabic:
هل كلمتم احد عن المشكلة؟
من هو؟

English:
I will report this higher
up and see if there
is something we can
do to fix the sewage
problem.
Transliteration:
raaH aKhabir al
qeeyaada al ‘ulya
winshoof iThaa
yagdiroon yesaa’idoon
fee mushkilat al

Arabic:
راح اخبر القيادة العليا و

English:
We will contact the
sewage company and

problem.
Transliteration:
raaH nitiSil bee sharikat
al majaaree winshoof
iThaa yagdiroon
yeSaliHoon al mushkila
Arabic:
راح نتصل بشركة المجاري
و نشوف اذا يقدرون
يصلحون المشكلة

English:
How many radios and
TVs are in this area?
Transliteration:
kam ‘adad ar rowaadee
wat talfizyonaat fee hal
manTiga?
Arabic:
كم عدد الروادي
والتلفزيونات في هالمنطقة؟

English:
Do you have a radio
station in this area?

Do you have a TV
station in the area?

Do you have a public
announcement
system?

Is there a news
agency representative
nearby?
Transliteration:
hal fee mandoob
wikaalat aKhbaar
gereeb min hina?
Arabic:
هل في مندوب وكالة اخبار
قريب من هنا؟

English:
Where do you buy a
newspaper?

What was produced
on the farm?

Transliteration:
min miHtal al ariDh al-
aan?

English:
I will contact
the appropriate
authorities to
investigate this
matter.
Transliteration:
raaH atiSil ‘ala al jihaat
al ma’neeya ‘ashaan
niHagig fee al mas-ala
Arabic:
راح اتصل على الجهات
المعنية عشان نحقق في
المسألة

English:
Please know we will
assist you.

You must allow the
local authorities
to conduct their
investigation.
Transliteration:
laazim ti’Tee as sulTaat
al maHaleeya furSa lee
‘amal at taHqeeq
Arabic:
لازم تعطي السلطات المحلية
فرصة لعمل التحقيق

English:
You must go to the
base and speak with
an interpreter.
Transliteration:
laazim trooH lil qaa’ida
wu titkalam ma’
mutarjim
Arabic:
لازم تروح للقاعدة و تتكلم
مع مترجم

Transliteration:
al istiKhdaam al Haalee
lil ‘aqaar al mamlook

English:
What is the condition
of the property?

Put your hands on the
steering wheel and do
not move them.
Transliteration:
HiT eedeynik ‘ala aT
Taara wu laa tiHarik-
hum
Arabic:
حط ايدينك على الطارة و لا
تحركهم

Transliteration:
int Khaalaft niDhaam
man’ at tajawul

niDhaam man’ at
tajawul saaree al
maf’ool

English:
Did you know there is
a curfew?
Transliteration:
hal ti’rif ina fee
niDhaam man’ at
tajawul?
Arabic:
هل تعرف انه في نظام منع
التجول؟

English:
The streets are not
safe right now.
Transliteration:
ash shawaari’ maa hee
aamina alHeen

English:
We will escort you to
your relatives.

The police station will
give you information
about curfew.
Transliteration:
markaz ash shurTa
raaH ye’Teek
ma’loomaat ‘an man’ at
tajawul
Arabic:
مركز الشرطة راح يعطيك
معلومات عن منع التجول

English:
May I see your ID,
please?

How much money are
you carrying?
Transliteration:
kam hee al fuloos alee
me’ik?

English:
Do you have a gun
under the seat?
Transliteration:
hal me’ik silaaH taHit al
kursee?

English:
Since you broke the
law, we have to arrest
you.
Transliteration:
bimaa inik Khaalaft
an niDhaam, laazim
niHaajizk
Arabic:
بما انك خالفت النظام، لازم
نحجزك

English:
We have to take you
to the police station.
Transliteration:
laazim naaKhiThk lee
markaz ash shurTa

English:
