Arabic: اذا وقفت في الشارع, خلى مساحة كافية للعربات التانية عشان يقدروا يمشو عند الضرورة.

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.
Transliteration: iza Daleyt darb aT-Tawf, intazir dawreeyaat al-jeysh timur wa-taabi’hum
Arabic: اذا ضليت درب الطوف , انتظر دوريات الجيش تمر و تابعهم.

English: Do not throw food or water to Sudanese locals.
Transliteration: ma tirmee akl aw moya lil-muwaaTineen as- soodaaniyeen
Arabic: ما ترمى اكل او موية للمواطنين السودانيين.

English: No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: maa tirmee awsaaKh aw tidfanha bee- mu'askaraat aw fee amaakin at-tarkeen
Arabic: ما ترمى اوساخ او تدفنها بمعسكرات الجيش او فى اماكن التركين .

English: Go around any broken down truck in the convoy.
Arabic: حاول ان تفتش اى عربة معطلة.

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Transliteration: zawid al-'arabeeya bil- wugood fee kul Haalat al-wugoof
Arabic: زود العربية بالوقود فى كل حالة الوقوف.

English: Food is provided at some military camps when available.
Transliteration: ba'D mu'askaraat al- jeysh bitwadee akl iza kaan mutawafira
Arabic: بعض معسكرات الجيش بتودى اكل اذا كان متوفرة.

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.
Transliteration: jeeb ma'aak akl wa- sharaab kaafee
Arabic: جيب معاك اكل و شراب كافى.

English: If you have to stop for any reason and the convoy continues, wait for help from the military.
Transliteration: iza wagaft lee-ayi sabab min al-asbaab wa-al-'arabaat at- taanya mishyoo, intazir moosaa'ada min al- jeysh
Arabic: اذا وقفت لاى سبب من الاسباب و العربات التانية مشوا, انتظر مساعدة من الجيش.

English: They will escort you back into position.
No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: maa tishaakil wa-laa tinaagish ma'a ayi sawaaq Hawl mawqi’ak fee aT-Tawf
Arabic: ما تشاكل ولا تناقش مع اى لسواق حول موقعك فى الطوف.

English: Bobtail Drivers: be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks.
Transliteration: al-makaanikeeya laazim yikoonoo jaahizeen lee- moosaa'ada fee Haalat 'uTul bil-'arabeeya
Arabic: المكانيكية لازم يكونو جاهزين لمساعدة في حالة عطل بالعربية .

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: baligh 'an ayi mushkila 'ind as-sawaageen at- taanyeen lee-qaa-id aT-Tawf.
Arabic: بلغ عن اى مشكلة عند السواقين التانيين لقائد الطوف.

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.
Transliteration: mamnoo' istiKhdaam al-muKhadiraat aw ayi Khamr fee Haalat as- siwaaqa
Arabic: ممنوع استخدام المخدرات او اى خمر فى حالة السواقة.

English: Know how to change tires and have proper tools.
Transliteration: iI'rif keyf tiSaliH al- lisaatik wa-yikoon ma'aak al-adawaat al- laazima
Arabic: اعرف كيف تصلح اللساتك , و يكون معاك الادوات اللازمة.

English: Loads, straps, chains, tires, are the drivers’ responsibility.
Transliteration: al-lisaatik wa-al- janaazeer wal- iHteeyaajaat aD- Darooreeya mas- ooleeyat as-sawaag
Arabic: اللساتك و الجنازير و الاحتياجات الضرورية مسؤولية السواق.

English: Check every time the convoy stops.
Transliteration: fatish al-'arabeeya daa-iman lama aT-Tawf yagif
Arabic: فتش العربية دائما لما طوف يقف.

English: How many people live in this area?
How many water wells do you have in this area?
Arabic: كم عدد آبارعندكم في المنطقة دى؟

English: Do you have a sewage system in this area?
Transliteration: hal 'indkum neezaam Sarf SaHee fee al- minTaqa dee?
Arabic: هل عندكم نظام صرف صحى في المنطقة دى؟

English: How far are the latrines from the water wells?
Transliteration: al-masaafa beyn al- maraaHeeD wa-aabaar al-maa gadir shinu?
Arabic: المسافة بين المراحيض و آبار الماء قدر شنو؟

English: What type of herds graze in this area?
Transliteration: no' al-Hayawaanaat bitir'a fee al-manTiqa dee?
Arabic: نوع الحيوانات بترعى فى المنطقة دى؟

English: Are there any factories in the area?
Transliteration: fee maSaani' fee al- manTiqa dee?

English: Where do you get electricity from?
Is there a power plant nearby?
Transliteration: Hal fee maHaTa kah- rabaa-eeya gareeba?

English: What kind of electric appliances do people use?
Transliteration: no' adawaat al- kah-rabaa-eeya al- musta'mala shinu?

English: Have there been forest fires in the area?
Transliteration: hal kaan fee Hareeg fee al-ghaaba fee al- manTiqa dee?
Arabic: هل كان فى حريق فى الغابة في المنطقة دى؟

English: Are there any gas pipes around here?
Transliteration: fee anaabeeb ghaaz Hawl al-manTiqa hina?
Arabic: فى انابيب غاز حول المنطقة هنا؟

English: Do you use gas to heat homes around here?
Transliteration: hal bitista'miloo ghaaz lee-tadfeeyat al-buyoot hina?
Arabic: هل بتستعملو غاز لتدفية البيوت هنا؟

English: Do you use propane gas tanks?
Transliteration: hal intoo ga'deen tista'miloo anaabeeb al-ghaaz?
Arabic: هل انتم قعدين تستعملو انابييب الغاز؟

English: Where do you get propane gas tanks supplied from?
Transliteration: bitjeeboo anaabeeb al- ghaaz min weyn?

English: Is there anyone to inspect home gas appliances?
Transliteration: fee zol beeraagib adawaat al-ghaaz fee al-beyt?
Arabic: فى زول بيراقب ادوات الغاز فى البيت؟

English: Is there a water supply system to households?
Transliteration: fee neezaam mawaaseer moya lil- buyoot?

English: How many people operate the system?
Is it connected to other water supply systems?
Transliteration: hal al-maHal muwaSal ma'a shabakaat al- moya at-taanya?
Arabic: هل المحل موصل مع شبكات الموية التانية؟

English: Where are the sources of raw water?
Is there a water treatment used?
Transliteration: hal fee tanqeeya maa- eeya mustaKhdama?

English: How many people are needed to keep the system functional?
Arabic: عازين كم نفر فى تشغيل المحطة؟

English: We’ve heard that there have been some problems with sewage in this neighborhood.
Transliteration: simi'na bee-wujood ba'D al-mashaakil fee neezaam aS-Sarf aS-SaHee bil-Hay al- mijawir
Arabic: سمعنا بوجود بعض المشاكل فى نظام الصرف الصحى بالحى المجاور.
هل عندكم سباخات موية فى البيوت؟

English: Do you have any problems with your plumbing?
Transliteration: fee mashaakil bitwaajih-kum fee as- sibaaKhaat?

English: How many toilettes do you have in the house?
Do you have a septic tank?
Is there anyone who can fix your sewer?
Transliteration: fee zol biyigdar yiSaliH leyk Saraafaat al- miyaah?
Arabic: فى زول بيقدر يصلح ليك صرافات المياه؟

English: Have you contacted anyone regarding this problem? If so who?
Transliteration: hal itaSalt bee-ayi waaHid bee-KhuSooS al-mushkila dee? minu?
Arabic: هل اتصلت باى واحد بخصوص المشكلة دى؟ منو؟

English: I will report this to higher and see if there is something we can do to fix the sewage problem.
Transliteration: Harfa’ at-taqreer foq wa-nishoof iza kaan fee ayi Haaja niHna mumkin ni'amloo Hata naHul al-mushkila
Arabic: حارفع التقرير فوق و نشوف اذا كان فى اى حاجة نحنا ممكن نعملو حتى نحل المشكلة .

English: We will contact sewage company and find out what is being done to correct the problem.
Transliteration: HanitaSel bee-shirkat aS-Sarf aS-SaHee lee- taHdeed al-'aTb
Arabic: حا نتصل بشركة الصرف الصحى لتحديد العطب.

English: How many radios and TVs are in this area?
Transliteration: kam 'adad rawaadee wa-talavizyonaat fee al-manTiqa dee?
Arabic: كم عدد روادى و تلفزيونات في المنطقة دى؟

English: Do you have a radio station in this area?
Arabic: هل عندكم اذاعة في المنطقة دى؟

English: Do you have a TV station in the area?
Transliteration: hal fee 'indkum maHaTa talavizyoneeya fee al-manTiqa dee?
Arabic: هل فى عندكم محطة تلفزيونية في المنطقة دى؟

English: Do you have a public announcement system?
Transliteration: hal fee 'indkum neezaam i'laan lil- jumhoor?
Arabic: هل فى عندكم نظام اعلان للجمهور؟

English: Is there a news agency representative nearby?
Transliteration: hal fee mandoob wikaalat al-anbaa gareeba?
Arabic: هل فى مندوب وكالة الانباء قريبة؟

Transliteration: hal fee markaz Khadamaat al- iKhbaareeya?

English: Where do you buy a newspaper?
What was produced on the farm?

Transliteration: daa minu gaa'id fee mazra'atkum Hisa?
Arabic: دا منو قاعد فى مزرعتكم حسى؟

English: I will contact the appropriate authorities to investigate this matter.
Transliteration: ana HaHaawil ataSel bee-mas-ool munaasib 'ashaan yitHara fee al- mushkila dee
Arabic: انا حا احاول اتصل بمسؤول مناسب عشان يتحرى في المشكلة دى؟

English: Please know we will assist you.
Transliteration: min faDlak laazim ti'rafoo niHna jeena lee- moosaa'adatkum
Arabic: من فضلكم لازم تعرفوا نحنا جينا لمساعدتكم.

English: You must allow the local authorities to conduct their investigation.
Transliteration: laazim tismaHoo lil-mas-ooleen al- maHaliyeen yiHaqiqoo

English: You must go to the base and speak with an interpreter.
Transliteration: laazim timshee al- mu'askar wa-tikallim ma'a al-mutarjim
Arabic: لازم تمشى المعسكر و تكلم مع المترجم.

English: What is the condition of the property?
Put your hands on the steering wheel and do not move them.
Arabic: خت يدينك على دركسيون وما تحركهم.

English: Did you know there is a curfew?
Transliteration: hal inta biti'raf inu fee Hazr at-tajawul?
Arabic: هل انت بتعرف انه فى حظر التجول؟

English: The streets are not safe right now.
We will escort you to your relatives.
The police station will give you information about curfew.
Transliteration: qism ash-shurTa Han'aTeek ma'loomaat 'an Hazr at-tajawul
Arabic: قسم الشرطة حنعطيك معلومات عن حظر التجول.

English: May I see your ID, please?

Transliteration: hal inta shaayil ma'aak ayi seelaaH?
Arabic: هل انت شايل معاك اى سلاح؟

English: How much money are you carrying?
Do you have a gun under the seat?

Transliteration: hal inta daasee ayi Haaja mamnoo'a?
Arabic: هل انت داسى ايى حاجة ممنوعة؟

English: Since you broke the law, we have to arrest you.
Transliteration: niHna laazim nigbaD 'aleyk Taalama inta kasart al-qaanoon
Arabic: نحنا لازم نقبض عليك طالما انت كسرت القانون.

English: We have to take you to the police station.
You will ride with us to the police station.
Can you help verify the man’s identity?
Transliteration: mumkin tisaa'id fee taHdeed haweeyat az- zol daa?
Arabic: ممكن تساعد فى تحديد هوية الزول دا؟

English: Get out of the truck please.
We need to inspect the cargo
Where did you get this ammunition?
Transliteration: min weyn jibt ad- daKheera dee?

English: Who does this ammunition belong to?
We are going to detain you and confiscate your truck.
Arabic: حنقبض عليك و حا نصادر عربيتك.

English: You will get your truck back, if you tell us who you are taking this to.
Transliteration: Hanraji' leyk 'arabeeyatak iza wareytna shaayil daa lee-minu
Arabic: حنرجع ليك عربيتك اذا وريتنا شايل دا لمنو.

English: Is there a road access for cars?
Is there a road access for 4wd?
Transliteration: hal fee Tareeg lee- 'arabaat ad-daf’ ar- rubaa'ee?
Arabic: هل فى طريق لعربات الدفع الرباعى؟

English: Is there a road access for trucks?
Is the road accessible in winter?
Transliteration: hal fee Tareeg SaaliH fee faSl ash-shitaa?
Arabic: هل الطريق صالح فى فصل الشتاء؟

English: What is the number of current population?
Who is responsible for food distribution?
Is this village used for secondary distribution?
Transliteration: hal al-qarya SaalHa ka-nuqTa tawzee' saanawee?
Arabic: هل القرية دى صالحة كنقطة توزيع ثانوى؟

English: Which villages receive assistance from this village?
Transliteration: yaatu quraa bitilga moosaa'ada min al- qarya dee?
Arabic: ياتو قرى بتلقى مساعدة من القرية دى؟

English: How many damaged houses in this village?
How many unfinished house in this village?
Transliteration: kam 'adad al-buyoot gheyr al-muktamala al-beenaa fee haaZihi al-qarya?
Arabic: كم عدد البيوت غير المكتملة البناء فى هذه القرية؟

English: Was there any new war damage to buildings since before the conflict?
Transliteration: hal kaan fee buyoot tama hadmuha bee- waaSiTat al-Harb gabli aS-Siraa'?
Arabic: هل كان فى بيوت تم هدمها بواسطة الحرب قبل الصراع؟

English: Is there a school in the village?
Is there a mosque / church in the village?
Transliteration: hal fee masjid / kaneesa fee al-qarya?
Arabic: هل فى مساجد / كنائس فى القرية؟

English: Is there any source of food available in the village?
Transliteration: hal fee maSaadir al- gheeZaa mutawafira fee al-qarya?
Arabic: هل فى مصادر الغذاء متوفرة فى القرية؟

English: Let me put you in contact with someone who can help you.
Transliteration: mumkin aHuTak fee al- itiSaal ma'a zol yimkin yisaa'idak
Arabic: ممكن احطك فى الاتصال مع زول يمكن يساعدك.

English: I will take you to him.
In order to be compensated for damages, you must talk to ___ .
Transliteration: 'ashaan ti'awiD 'an al- Khasaa-ir inta laazim titkalim lee ___
Arabic: عشان تعوض عن الخسائر انت لازم تتكلم لـ .___

English: Where do you live? (i.e. what is your address?)
What kind of car is it? (year, make, model)
Arabic: دا ياتو نوع عربية؟ (سنة , موديل, صناعة)

English: Where is your car right now?
Can you bring your car here?
What CF vehicle damaged your car?
Arabic: دا ياتو عربية جيش صدم عربيتك؟

English: What soldiers were involved in the accident?
Transliteration: daa yaatu junood kaanoo mas-ooleen 'an al-Haadis?
Arabic: دا ياتو جنود كانو مسؤولين عن الحادث؟

English: In order to be compensated for damages, you must fill out this document.
Transliteration: inta laazim timlee warneyk daa iza kunt daayir at-ta'weeD 'an al-Khasaa-ir
Arabic: انت لازم تملى ورنيك دا اذا كنت داير التعويض عن الخسائر.

English: In order to be compensated for damages, you must see ___ .
Transliteration: laazim tigaabil ___ iza kunt daayir at-ta'weeD 'an al-Khasaa-ir
Arabic: لازم تقابل ___ اذا كنت داير التعويض عن الخسائر.

English: Where can we purchase vegetables and fruit?
Transliteration: weyn mumkin nishtaree al- KhuDrawaat wa-al- fawaaki?

English: Where can we purchase bread and grains?
Arabic: وين ممكن نشترى الرغيف و الدقيق؟

English: Where can we purchase dairy products?
We need to examine the herd.
We need to examine the animals on the farm.
We need to inspect the slaughterhouse for sanitation.
We need to inspect the bakery for sanitation.
We need to inspect the dairy plant.
We need to inspect the poultry plant.
When was the last time these animals were inoculated?
Do they need to be vaccinated?
This food is spoiled, please do not eat it.
Are the crops infected with insects?
Transliteration: hal fee aafaat fee az- zar'?

English: Are the animals infected with parasites?
Transliteration: hal al-Hayawaanaat deyl muSaabeen biT- Tufayleeyaat?

English: We are here to help you.
I do not understand your language.
There is no one available who speaks this language.
Transliteration: maa fee waaHid mawjood bi'rif bitkalam al-lugha dee
Arabic: ما في واحد موجود بعريف بتكلم اللغة دي.

English: Try to answer my questions with "no" or "yes."
Transliteration: Haawil jaawib 'ala as- ilatee bee-“laa” aw “na'am”

English: Move your head like this for "yes."
Move your head like this for "no."
Do you know where you are?

Arabic: عايز تبول؟ / هل انت عايز تبول؟

English: We will try to contact someone from your group.
Transliteration: niHna HanaHaawil nitaSel bee-waaHid min majmoo'atak
Arabic: نحن حنحاول نتصل بواحد من مجموعتك.

English: Thank you for talking with me.
I will talk with you again.
Hold up the number of fingers.
I need to clean your wounds.
I am here to help you.
What country were you born in?
Do you have an identity card?
Do you have any bad reactions to medications?
Transliteration: hal 'indak ayi Hasaaseeya / rudood al- fi'il lid-dawaa?
Arabic: هل عندك اى حساسية / ردود الفعل للدواء؟

English: What is the name of the medication that causes bad reactions?
Transliteration: ism ad-dawaa al-bisabib leyk Hasaaseeya / rudood al-fi'il daa shinu?
Arabic: اسم الدواء البسبب ليك حساسية / ردود الفعل دا شنو؟

English: Do you have any allergies to medicines?
How many packs of cigarettes do you smoke per day?
Arabic: بتدخن في اليوم كم علبة سجائر؟

English: Do you have high blood pressure problems?
Arabic: هل عندك مشاكل ارتفاع ضغط دم؟

English: Do you have blood sugar control problems?
Transliteration: hal 'indak mashaakil taHkeem keemiyat as- sukar fee ad-dam?
Arabic: هل عندك مشاكل تحكيم كمية السكر فى الدم؟

English: We will take care of you.
We will try not to hurt you further.
Show me where it hurts worst.
When did you have your last meal?
When was your last bowel movement?
We need to take you to surgery.
If we do not operate, you may die.
Arabic: اذا ما عملنا العملية انت حتموت.

English: If we do not operate, you may lose this.
Transliteration: iza maa 'amilna al- 'amaleeya inta Hatafgid daa
Arabic: اذا ما عملنا العملية انت حتفقد دى.

English: The operation is dangerous, but it is the only way to help you.
Transliteration: al-'amaleeya dee KhaTir laakin hiya aT-Tareega al-waHeeda lee- moosaa'adatak
Arabic: العملية دى خطر لكن هى الطريقة الوحيدة لمساعدتك.

English: Do you understand that you need this surgery?
Transliteration: hal inta faahim bee-inak fee al-Hawja lil-'amaleeya dee?
Arabic: هل انت فاهم بانك في الحوجة للعملية دى؟

English: We want your permission before we operate on you.
Transliteration: niHna daayreen naaKhud al-izin minek gabli maa na'mil feek al-'amaleeya
Arabic: نحنا دايرين ناخذ الإذن منك قبل ما نعمل فيك العملية.

English: We will begin the operation as soon as we can.
Transliteration: niHna Hanibda al- 'amaleeya fee agrab waqti mumkin
Arabic: نحنا حنبداء العملية في اقرب وقت ممكن.

English: This medicine will make you sleep.
Do you have any allergies, especially to medications?
Arabic: هل عندك اى حساسية خاصة للادوية؟

English: Do you have high blood pressure / diabetes or blood sugar control problems?
Transliteration: hal 'indak DaghT ad-dam / sukaree aw mushlika tiHakim 'ala nisbat as- sukar fee al-dam?
Arabic: هل عندك ضغط الدم / سكري او مشكلة تحكم على نسبة السكر في الدم؟

English: We are all working to help you.
Help us take care of you.
We have to remove your clothes.
Do you have any bad reactions to any medicine?
Transliteration: hal 'indak ayi Hasaaseeya / rudood al-fi'l lid-dawaa?
Arabic: هل عندك اى حساسية / ردود الفعل للدواء؟

English: Have you eaten food in the past six hours?
Transliteration: hal akalta akl fee Kheelaal sita saa'aat al-maaDiya?
Arabic: هل اكلت اكل في خلال ستة ساعات الماضية؟

English: Is this injury from a landmine?
Transliteration: hal aj-jarH dee min al- lagham?

English: Is this from a vehicle crash?
Did a person do this to you?
Did you lose consciousness after this happened?
Transliteration: hal fagadt al-wa'ee ba'di- maa daa HaSal?
Arabic: هل فقدت الوعي بعدما دا حصل؟

English: Did you lose more than this much blood?
Transliteration: hal fagadta aktar min kimeeyat ad-dam daa?
Arabic: هل فقدت اكثر من كمية الدم دا؟

English: Point to all the parts of your body that hurt.
Transliteration: ashir iley kuli ajzaa jismak al-biyooja'ak
Arabic: اشر الي كل اجزاء جسمك البيوجاعك .

English: Does it hurt when I do this?
Transliteration: hal dee biyooja' lama na'mil kida?
Arabic: هل دى بيوجع لما نعمل كدا؟

English: Did you inhale any smoke or very hot air?
I have to put a small needle in you here.
Transliteration: ana HadaKhil ibra Sughayara feek hina
Arabic: انا حدخل ابرة صغيرة فيك هنا.

English: We need to give you fluid.
We need to give you blood.
I need to put a tube into your throat.
Arabic: انا عايز ادخل انبوبة في حلقك.

English: This tube will help you breathe better.

Transliteration: anbooba dee Hayisabib Hasaaseeya gheyr mureeH
Arabic: انبوبة دى حيسبب حساسية غير مريح.

English: I need to put a tube through your nose to your stomach.
Transliteration: ana 'aayiz adaKhil anbooba fee ma'aditak bee-waasiTat anfak
Arabic: انا عايز ادخل انبوبة في معدتك بواسطة انفك.

English: You need to swallow while I put this tube in your nose.

English: We would like to talk to people about sanitization.

Arabic: بدنا نحكي مع الناس عن التعقيم

English: Is there a medical emergency facility?
We have to establish a safe working environment.

We have to hire nurses for this facility.
We have to hire office personnel for this facility.
We have to hire a custodian for this facility.

English: Can you use these roads during the winter?

English: Do not stop if convoy is attacked!
Transliteration: maa itwa-f lo hajamoo ‘ala il qaafleh!
Arabic: ما توقف لو هجموا على القافلة!

English: Drive a minimum of 3 km before stopping.

Arabic: سوق سيارتك إتلاتة كيلو متر على الاقل قبل ما توقف

Arabic: المسافة التالية مية متر في طريق سريع مكشوف

Transliteration: ba’edhaa masaafet Khamseen meter fee il mudun
Arabic: بعدها مسافة خمسين متر في المدن

English: When stopped on the road, keep enough space between vehicles to drive around if required.

Arabic: لما بتوقف في الشارع , خلي مسافة كافية بين السيارات لتدور لو طلبوا منك

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.

Arabic: لو ما عدت شفت القافلة، قصر وانطر حتى تمر عنك شاحنة عسكرية، والحقها

English: Do not throw food or water to the locals.

English: No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ ramee il faDhalaat wil izbaaleh bil muKhayamaat il ‘askareeyeh wo manaaTe il mawaaqe’
Arabic: ممنوع رمي الفضلات والزبالة بالمخيمات العسكرية ومناطق المواقع

English: Go around any broken down truck in the convoy.
Transliteration: door Hawel is sayaara il mu’aTaleh bil qaafleh
mamnoo’ maSaabeeH il aDhwaa il met-aT’a

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Transliteration: imlee is sayaara bil woqood kel mara betwa-f is sayaara
Arabic: إملي السيارة بالوقود كل مرة بتوقف السيارة

English: Food is provided at some military camps when available.

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.

English: If you have to stop for any reason and the convoy continues, wait for help from the military.
Transliteration: lo laazem itwa- f le ay sabab wil qaafleh Hatkamel, inTur laysaa’dook il ‘askareeyeen
Arabic: لو لازم توقف لأي سبب والقافلة حتكمل , إنطر ليساعدوك العسكريين

English: They will escort you back into position.
Transliteration: Hayraaf-ook beTaree il rejoo’ ila il mawqe’

English: No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ il iKhnaa wil jedaal ma’a saa-q aaKher Hawel makaan bil qaafleh
Arabic: ممنوع الخناق والجدال مع سائق آخر حول مكان بالقافلة

English: Be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks. (Note: This is an instruction for bobtail drivers.)

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: Khaber mas-ool il qaafelh ‘an ay meshekleh teHSel lil saa-eeqeen il aaKhereen
Arabic: خبر مسؤول القافلة عن أي مشكلة تحصل للسائقين الاخرين

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ ta’aaTee il muKhaderaat aw il kuHool ‘end sooq is sayaara
Arabic: ممنوع تعاطي المخدرات او الكحول عند سوق السيارة

Arabic: إتعلم كيف تغير الدواليب وخلي عندك عدة كاملة

English: Loads, straps, chains, and tires are the drivers’ responsibility.
Transliteration: is saa-eeqeen mas- ooleen ‘an il iHomolaat, wil iHbaal, wil salaasel, wil dawaaleeb
Arabic: السائقين مسؤولين عن الحمولات، والحبال ، والسلاسل، والدواليب

Arabic: إفحص السيارة كل مرة القافلة بتوقف

English: How many people live in this area?

English: Where do you live? / What is your address?

English: Move your head like this for “no.”

English: I need to clean your wounds.

English: This medicine will make you sleep.

Arabic: خسرت قبل هلق دم أكتر من يللي إخسرته؟

Arabic: شاورلي على أي جزء من جسمك يللي عم يوجعك

English: Drive a minimum of 3 kms before stopping.

Arabic: سوج على الأجل 3 كيلو جبل ما توجف

English: Following distance is 100m on open highway.
Transliteration: masaafat at-tataabu’ meeyat meetar biT- Tareeg as-saree’ al- maftooH
Arabic: مسافة التتابع 100 متر بالطريج السريع المفتوح

Transliteration: masaafat at-tataabu’ Khamseen meetar bil- gura

English: When stopped on the road, keep enough space between vehicles to drive around if required.
Transliteration: ‘and at-tawaguf biT- Tareeg Khalee masaafa kaafeeya bayn as- sayaaraat le-suhoolat at-taHaruk iTha gaDha al-amr
Arabic: عند التوجف بالطريج، خلي مسافة كافية بين السيارات لسهولة التحرك إذا جضى الأمر

English: If you lose sight of the convoy, slow down and wait for a military truck to pass you, and follow it.
Transliteration: iTha Dhaa’at ‘aleyk al- Hiraasa, Khafif as-sur’a wa-raa’ee la-’arabat nagl al-geysh tisbagak, wa-ba’adayn itba’ha
Arabic: إذا ضاعت عليك الحراسة، خفف السرعة وراعي لعربة نقل الجيش تسبجك، وبعدين إتبعها

English: Do not throw food or water to the locals.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ ramee al- akal wal-maa ila al- muwaaTineen

English: No littering or dumping trash on military camps or staging areas.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ bi’tharat aw ramee az-zibaala fee mu’askaraat al- geysh aw bi-manTigat tajamu’ al-goowaat al- ’askareeya
Arabic: ممنوع بعثرة أو رمي الزبالة في معسكرات الجيش أو بمنطجة تجمع الجوات العسكرية

English: Go around any broken down truck in the convoy.
Arabic: عدي أي عربة نجل عاطلة في الحراسة

English: Fuel vehicle every time vehicle stops.
Transliteration: tamawan bil-benzeen kul mara titwagif as- sayaaraat
Arabic: تمون بالبنزين كل مرة تتوجف السيارات

English: Food is provided at some military camps when available.
Transliteration: yuSraf akil fee ba’Dh mu’askaraat al-geysh iTha kaana mutaaHan
Arabic: يصرف أكل في بعض معسكرات الجيش إذا كان متاحاً

English: Bring plenty of food and water with you.

Transliteration: iTha kaan laazim toogaf li-ayi sabab wa-al- Hiraasa mustamira, rayi’ li-musaa’ada min al-geysh
Arabic: إذا كان لازم توجف لأي سبب والحراسة مستمرة، ريّع لمساعدة من الجيش

English: They will escort you back into position.
No fighting or arguing with any other driver over position in convoy.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ al- muDhaaraba wa-ila al- nizaa’ ma’a ayi saa-ig minshaan makaan bil- Hiraasa
Arabic: ممنوع المضرابة وإلا النزاع مع أي سائق منشان مكان بالحراسة

English: Be prepared to stop and assist broken down trucks. (Note: This is an instruction for bobtail drivers.)
Transliteration: kun jaahiz lit-tawaguf li- musaa’edat al-’arabaat al-’aaTila (haaThihee ta’leemaat li-saa-iqee al-mu-aKhira)
Arabic: كن جاهز للتوجف لمساعدة العربات العاطلة (هذه تعليمات لسائقي المؤخرة(

English: Report any problems with other drivers to the convoy commander.
Transliteration: baligh ‘an ayi mashkeela ma’a saa- ig aaKhir li-gaa-id al- Hiraasa
Arabic: بلّغ عن أي مشكلة مع سائج آخر لجائد الحراسة

English: No drug or alcohol use while driving.
Transliteration: mamnoo’ istiKhdaam al-muKhadiraat aw shurb al-kuHool athnaa as-suwaaga
Arabic: ممنوع إستخدام المخدرات أو شرب الكحول أثناء السواجة

English: Know how to change tires and have proper tools.
Transliteration: laazim ti’rif keyf tighayir at-taa-iraat wa-yakoon ‘andak mu’adaat munaasiba
Arabic: لازم تعرف كيف تغيّر التائرات ويكون عندك معدات مناسبة

English: Loads, straps, chains, and tires are the drivers’ responsibility.
Transliteration: at-taHmeel wa-ar-rabT wa-at-tawtheeg bis- salaasil wat-taa-iraat min mas-ooleeyat as- sawaag
Arabic: التحميل، والربط، والتوثيج بالسلاسل، والتائرات من مسؤولية السواج

English: Check every time the convoy stops.
Transliteration: rakiz ‘ala al-Hiraasa fee kul mara titwagaf
Arabic: ركز على الحراسة في كل مرة تتوجف

English: How many people live in this area?
Transliteration: kam beh naas yeskunoo bi-teeyeh al- manTiga?
Arabic: كم به ناس يسكنوا بتيه المنطجة؟

Arabic: سمعنا أنه كان هاناك مشاكل مع مياه البواليع بتيه الحارة

Arabic: به عندك أحدا يصلح لك حجك البالوعة؟

Arabic: هل إتصلت بأي شخص منشان تيه المشكلة؟ إذا كان كذلك، مَنْ هو؟

English: We will contact the sewage company and find out what is being done to correct the problem.

Arabic: عنتصل بشركة مياه البواليع لمعرفة ما جاموا به لتصحيح المشكلة

Do you have a TV station in the area?

English: What is the condition of the property?
Put your hands on the steering wheel and do not move them.

English: I need to give you some medicine

English: If she promised you information, be sure to give your contact information to her.
Transliteration: law wa’adtak bi- ma’loomat it-akad bi-an ta’Tee ma’loomaatak ash-shaKhSeeya laha
Arabic: لو وعدتك بمعلومات، إتأكد بأن تعطي معلوماتك الشخصية لها

English: If I promised you information, be sure to give your contact information to me.
Transliteration: law wa’adtak bi- ma’loomaat it-akad bi-an ta’Teenee ma’loomaatak ash- shaKhSeeya
Arabic: لو وعدتك بمعلومات، إتأكد بأن تعطني معلوماتك الشخصية

English: Another session will take place later today.
I am not an official spokesperson.
Please wait for the public affairs representative.
Transliteration: law samaHt rayi’ li- mandoob al-’ilaagaat al-’aama
Arabic: لو سمحت ريّع لمندوب العلاجات العامة

English: I can only tell you what I know.
Transliteration: agdir agool lak maa a’rifeh fagaT
Arabic: أجدر أجول لك ما أعرفه فجط

English: We are doing everything we can to restore order.
Transliteration: beynasawee gadir al- mustaTaa’ le-ee’aadat al-waDha’ kamaa kaan ‘aleyh
Arabic: بينسوي جدر المستطاع لإعادة الوضع كما كان عليه

English: We are doing everything we can to protect lives.
Transliteration: beynasawee gadir al- mustaTaa’ li-Himaayat al-arwaaH

English: We are doing everything we can to save lives.
Transliteration: beynasawee gadir al- mustaTaa’ li-in-gaaTh al-arwaaH

English: We are taking this matter very seriously.
Names cannot be released until victims’ relatives are notified.
Transliteration: al-asaamee maa bitu’lansh ila ba’dmaa yubalagh agaarib aDh- DhaHaaya
Arabic: الأسامي ما بتعلنش إلا بعدما يبلغ أجارب الضحايا

English: The official spokesman is expected here soon.
Transliteration: al-mut-Hadith ar- rasmee ‘aykoon haanaa ba’d galeel
Arabic: المتحدث الرسمي عيكون هانا بعد جليل

English: We take every report of wrongdoing very seriously.
Transliteration: naaKhuTh kul tigreer li-ay i’teedaa bi-jideeya gawee
Arabic: نأخذ كل تجرير لأي إعتداء بجدية جوي

English: We have secured the area where the incident occurred.
Transliteration: aman-na al-manTiga alee waga’ feeha al- Haadith
Arabic: أمنا المنطجة اللي وجع فيها الحادث

English: I am sorry but you have to wait for the report.
Transliteration: aana aasif wa-laakin laazim trayi’ lit-tigreer
Arabic: أنا آسف ولكن لازم تريّع للتجرير
